description: Creative Chefs Can Make & Bake Awesome Mac and Cheese! Get Cooking! Play Pasta Chef in an Amazing, Yummy Game! Bake & Decorate Your Mac & Cheese, Set a Fun Table & Eat! What’s for dinner? Parents know that Mac & Cheese is a kid’s favorite food. Now it’s an awesome game too! Making Mac & Cheese has never been so fun and delicious! Kids can play pasta chef and get creative in the kitchen cooking their own fancy Macaroni & Cheese. Kids can make the cheese sauce from scratch & cook up the food on their own. Put the ingredients into a bowl and mix it up with a spoon. Then kids will place the pasta into the oven to bake. But wait, there’s more! In the Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker, kid can decorate their pasta creations with dozens of food toppings to choose from. Little macaroni chefs can get busy in the kitchen and make this classic kids’ food favorite something special. A great food app for the whole family to inspire cooking together. Parents will love watching their kids get excited about cooking too. The Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker is a fantastic family cooking game! What's inside Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker ★ Mix up ingredients: mustard, milk, cheese ..and make the perfect cheese sauce ★ Place the macaroni & cheese into the oven to bake! Don’t let the macaroni burn! ★ Decorate your pasta to make food faces with tons of veggies & potato chips toppings ★ Set your table! Dozens of items including: bowls, plates, napkins, drinks and more ★ Eat and drink it! Kids can gobble up their food and drink a yummy beverage - many to choose! Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker Features ★ Touch & drag to mix up the ingredients ★ Cool smiley-face thermometer with colors & faces tells kids when the food is ready ★ Press the “RESTART” button and kids can eat their macaroni & drink all over again! ★ Improved menu system - makes navigation easier The Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker is an amazing virtual cooking game for the whole family. Kids will make, bake, decorate and eat their yummy pasta creations. Mac & Cheese has never been so fun! description: This app will help you log your workouts. No more fiddling around with pen and pencil. No more printing out the worksheets. Throw it all away and log your workouts on your mobile device. description: Simple application to track your working hours and salary. Development team put a large emphasis of simplicity and ease of use for the user. Whenever you arrive at work, simply click "In" to log your shift start time; when you leave work, click "Out" to log your shift end time. In order for you to evaluate the compatibility of the application to your needs, the basic version is free with limited features (with ads). For the first 60 days most of the features are available. After that time you will have to upgrade to Pro version to use all features. You can upgrade to the Pro version (without ads) from within the application. Features of the free version: * Widget for In/Out logging without opening the application * Clicking on the widget title will open the application * Select between monthly or weekly summary type * Set the first working day of the week (in weekly summary type) * Current month\week shift list * Configure automatic break time * Allow to overwrite break time in each shift * Indication on overlapping time (Red indicator) * Indication on open shift (Yellow indicator) * Indication on break time (Green indicator) * Custom Shift color Additional features in the Evaluation\Pro version: * Backup and Restore of the data (Pro only) * Automatically save backups in Google Drive (optional) * Working month can start on a custom date (not on the first on the month) - On the shift list view there will be an indication of the actual month * Gross salary calculation * Setting hourly rate by date (e.g. when you get a raise) * Configure automatic expenses * Allow to overwrite expenses in each shift * Extra hours calculation * Configure multiple shift types * Support multiple "In"/"Out" in a single shift (split shift - Up to 5 parts in a shift) * Indication on split shift (Orange indicator) * Monthly\Weekly summary of all shifts * View any month\week * Send email report of your working time (from "Shift List" view) in CSV (Comma Separated Value) format Any comments\requests can be sent to hanan.android.dev@gmail.com . Just put in the subject "Shift Logger".
release_text: * Bug fixes User requests * Added an option to separate date and time into two columns in CSV file.

description: Turn your smartphone into an altimeter with this outdoor app and enjoy additional features like compass, weather information, exact position and sunrise & sunset times! Plus, you’ll always get a weather forecast to make sure you’re not caught out by a thunderstorm. Aim high & enjoy your hikes with Runtastic Altimeter PRO, the ideal hiking app! APP FEATURES & BENEFITS: * Accurate measurement of altitude (elevation) with Runtastic altitude online service * Photo feature with built-in altitude and sharing * Delete the Runtastic watermark on your photos * Share your outdoor pics with friends via Google+, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp or email * Altitude indicated in meters or feet * Sunrise and sunset info * Compass * GPS coordinates * Current temperature and wind speed * No ads Calculate your altitude with GPS while an additional online service refines the calculations. Whether you are ascending Ben Nevis or navigating the Brecon Beacons, the Runtastic Altimeter PRO app knows your current altitude. With the integrated photo capture function you can record your favorite views and share them with your friends instantly via G+, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp or via email. The Runtastic Altimeter PRO app is a great app for all enthusiasts of outdoor activities such as hiking, walking, skiing, rock climbing or mountain biking. Runtastic is all about health & fitness apps! Check out more of our apps to help you reach your fitness goals at http://play.google.com/store/search?q=pub:Runtastic

description: Speed a card game also known as Spit or Slam, is very fast-paced game and it could result in damage to the cards -- so play this on your device and don't ruin your actual playing cards. Speed is a game for two players of the shedding family of card games, in which each player tries to get rid of all of his cards. Speed is a game associated with the game Nertz. Controls: Tap or Drag the cards Objective: To play all your cards first. How to Play: -Each player is dealt five cards to form a hand, and each player is dealt 15 cards face down to form a draw pile. If you are playing with jokers, you use them as wild cards and give each draw pile 16 cards. A stack of five cards, placed face down on each side between the players, serves as a replacement pile. Finally, two cards are placed face down in the center between the replacement piles. -You may play a card in your hand by discarding it in the "Play Pile" if the card is 1 number/value higher or lower. (e.g. 5 can be played on a 6 or 4, a Queen can be played on a King or Jack) -A 2 may be played on an Ace and a Ace may be played on a 2. -You may have up to 5 cards in your hand at a single time. When you have less than 5 cards in your hand you may draw from your "Draw Pile" -First player to play all of his/her cards wins!

description: Pick the best seat on the plane, find low airfares, and get real-time flight status alerts with the free SeatGuru(R) app - all from the ultimate source for airplane seating advice, in-flight amenity information, and airline recommendations. Whether you're at the airport or on the go, SeatGuru is now optimized for your Android phone. The free app lets you access over 700 seat maps from nearly 100 airlines. It features advice and insights drawn from over 45,000 passenger reviews, so you can always find the best seat before you fly. With the SeatGuru app, you can now shop great low airfares from low-cost carriers, online travel agencies, and airlines themselves to find the right flight for you at the lowest price. And you also have access to our flight status alerts which allow you to track arrival times, delays, and other important flight information. Seatguru.com and the SeatGuru app give travelers the information they need to make better and more informed travel decisions by providing comprehensive, extensive, and trusted seat recommendations and airline advice.
release_text: * Improved the UI and added some animations * Fixed issues with Samsung Galaxy S3 devices * Over 350 new high resolution seat maps with improved iconography and more realistic seat renderings to allow you to more easily understand the key aircraft features for the following airlines: United, Delta, American Airlines, US Airways, JetBlue, British Airways, Lufthansa, Air France, KLM, Air Canada, Qantas, Air New Zealand, Cathay Pacific, Singapore Airlines, Emirates Airlines, ANA, Alaska Airlines

description: - Ad Free version available! - http://goo.gl/8J3Yvz Features: ✔ High resolution photos ✔ American bird song, calls and sounds ✔ Fully spoken names ✔ Available offline - no need for a connection ✔ Provides beautifully presented information about North America's precious wildlife Birdlife of North America is an educational and fun way to find out what you need to know about the North American natives. If you're from abroad, planning on heading there or just another curious American, you'll find something to discover and enjoy about the friendly locals. North America covers an area of about 24,709,000 square kilometers (9,540,000 square miles), about 4.8% of the planet's surface or about 16.5% of its land area. Most of the continent's land area is dominated by Canada, the United States, and Mexico, while smaller states exist in the Central American and Caribbean regions. The precious and fascinating bird life that evolved in North America are varied, beautiful and a sight to behold. ***** THIS APP IS ACTIVELY SUPPORTED - If you have any questions, problems or suggestions - Either email me directly at craig.sisson@upsidekiwi.co.nz , or leave a review and I'll get back to you as soon as possible! Content Attribution: Wikipedia http://en.wikipedia.org/ xeno-canto http://www.xeno-canto.org/ USFWS National Digital Library http://digitalmedia.fws.gov/cdm/ Flickr http://www.flickr.com/ All images and information for the animals included are sourced under Creative Commons licenses.

description: Preisvergleich 2.0 – Schnäppchen oder kein Schnäppchen? Mit YouPickIt weißt Du genau, was Du wo und wann am billigsten einkaufen kannst - zu jedem deutschen Standort kennt die App die billigsten Schnäppchen. Du erstellst eine Einkaufsliste und kannst Deinen Einkauf mit dem Einkaufsoptimierer individuell planen. Die App zeigt Dir, welches Produkt Du bei welchem Markt Deiner Umgebung einkaufen musst, um beim Einkauf am meisten zu sparen. Täglich werden ca. 60 Mio. Preise zu 600.000 Produkten verschiedener Märkte dargestellt und via Preisvergleich bewertet. Besonders günstige Preise sind mit Gold-, Silber- und BronzePicks gekennzeichnet. Der Preisvergleich für Lebensmittel, Drogerie, Baumarkt und Elektronik per Hand zur Suche nach den besten Schnäppchen war gestern! YouPickIt zeigt, welche Angebote wirklich günstig sind und welche nur billig als günstig verkauft werden. Das Preisvergleichs-Portal bietet alle Vorteile anderer Einkaufs-Apps und mehr. Die Funktionen der Einkaufsoptimierer App: - Wähle Deinen deutschen Standort und vergleiche alle Prospekte und Angebote der Märkte Deiner Umgebung bequem über das Smartphone - Sei auch an fremden Standorten über Händler und Angebote informiert: die Karte zeigt die Märkte der Umgebung auf einen Blick und führt direkt zu den Angeboten der Händler. - Du kannst Produkte mit dem Barcode Scanner scannen und sie zum Sparen direkt auf die Einkaufsliste legen. - Führe mit dem Barcode Scanner einen Preisvergleich direkt im Laden durch. Gebe einen Preis ein und die App zeigt wie billig er ist. Solltest Du ein Produkt über den Barcode Scanner nicht finden, nutze die Mailfunktion und schicke uns ein Foto. Beim nächsten Einkauf wirst du es auf Deine Einkaufsliste legen können. - Speichere Produkte und Märkte als Favoriten in Deinem Profil, damit YouPickIt sie für Dich in den Prospekten und Suchergebnissen kennzeichnen kann. - Die intelligenten Prospekte zeigen die billigsten Angebote und Deine Favoriten auf einen Blick. - Der PickAlarm informiert Dich über Angebote zu Deinen liebsten Produkten per Mail. - Das Herzstück: Mit dem Einkaufsoptimierer sparst du am meisten! Einfach Produkte in die Einkaufsliste laden und festlegen, wie optimiert werden soll: nur die günstigsten Preise, nur in Favoritenmärkten oder alles im günstigsten Markt einkaufen? Mit einem Klick sagt Dir die App, welche Produkte Du bei welchem Händler einkaufen musst, um am meisten zu sparen. Der Preisvergleich erfolgt automatisch. - Hake die Produkte im Markt über die App ab und lege den Einkauf ins Haushaltsbuch. - Mit dem Haushaltsbuch hast du eine Übersicht aller Deiner Einkäufe Lade Dir die Einkaufen, Prospekte, Angebote App und verpasse keine Schnäppchen mehr! Ein Auszug der Märkte, zu denen Du Angebote und Prospekte bei YouPickIt findest: - Discounter (Aldi, Lidl, Netto, Norma, Penny) - Supermärkte (Edeka, Globus, Hit, Kaisers, Kaufland, Marktkauf, Ratio, Real, Rewe, Tegut, Toom) - Biomärkte (Alnatura Bio, Basic Bio, Bio Markt, Denns Bio, Vitalia Bio) - verschiedene Getränkemärkte - Großmärkte (Metro, Fegro) - Drogerie und Parfümerie (Budni, DM, Douglas, Ihr Platz, Müller, Rossmann) - Tchibo - Tierbedarf (Das Futterhaus, Fressnapf, Kölle Zoo, Tiergarten, Zoo+Co) - Elektronik (Electronic Partner, Euronics, Expert, Media Markt, Medi Max, Saturn) - Bau + Garten (Bauhaus, Dehner, Globus, Hagebau, Hornbach, Max Bahr, Obi, Toom) - Kaufhäuser (Galeria Kaufhof, Karstadt, Woolworth) - Sonderposten (MäcGeiz, Pfennigpfeiffer, Tedi, Thomas Philipps, Zimmermann) - Spielwaren (Baby One, Rofu, Toys-R-Us, Vedes) - Mobilfunk (Telekom, o2 Vodafone, e-Plus ...) Zusätzlich werden folgende Prospekte zum Blättern angeboten: - Einrichtung (Dänisches Bettenlager, Depot, Ikea, Poco, Porta, Roller, Segmüller, Sconto) - Mode/Kleidung (Takko, Deichmann, Ernstings Family, Intersport, Kik, NKD) You pick it - Mit YouPickIt! Besuch uns online: www.youpickit.de Bei Anregungen oder Fragen: schreib uns an info@youpickit.de Dein YouPickIt Team Check Rates 2.0 - bargain or no bargain? With YouPickIt You know exactly what you can where and when the cheapest buy - at any site in Germany knows the app the cheapest deals. You create a shopping list and can individually plan your shopping with shopping optimizer. The app shows you which product you need to shop at which market your area to save when shopping at the most. 60 million prizes are presented to 600,000 products from different markets and evaluated via price comparison daily. Particularly favorable prices marked with gold, silver and bronze picks. The price comparison for groceries, drug store, hardware store and electronics by hand to find the best bargain was yesterday! YouPickIt shows which services are really cheap and which are sold only as cheap cheap. The price comparison site offers all the advantages of other shopping apps and more. The functions of the Shopping optimizer app: - Choose your German site and compare all brochures and deals from markets your area easily accessible via the smartphone - Be informed of other locations through dealers and offerings: the map shows the markets in the region at a glance and leads directly to the offers of the dealer. - You can scan scanner and place to save directly to the shopping list items with the barcode. - Perform with the barcode scanner to compare prices in the store by. Enter a price and the app shows how cheap it is. If you do not find the product via the barcode scanner, use the email function and send us a photo. If you buy you'll be able to put it on your shopping list. - Save products and markets as favorites in your profile, so YouPickIt can identify them for you in the brochures and search results. - The intelligent brochures show the cheapest deals and your favorites at a glance. - The Pick alarm notifies you about deals on your favorite products via email. - The heart: The Shopping optimizer you save the most! Load and set simple products to the shopping list, as will be optimized only the lowest prices only in favorites markets or buy everything in the most favorable market? By clicking the app tells you what products you need in which traders buy to save most. The price comparison is done automatically. - Hake products in the market through the app now and put the shopping into the budget book. - With the budget book you an overview of all your purchases Upload you the shopping, brochures, offers app and do not miss any more deals! An extract of the markets which you can find deals and brochures at YouPickIt: - Discounters (Aldi, Lidl, Netto, Norma, Penny) - Supermarkets (Edeka, Globe, hit, Emperor, Kaufland, market purchase, ratio, Real, Rewe, Tegut, Toom) - Organic markets (Alnatura Bio Basic Bio, Organic market, Denns Bio, Vitalia Bio) - Different beverage stores - Wholesale Markets (Metro, Fegro) - Drugstore and perfumery (Budni, DM, Douglas, your place, Müller, Rossmann) - Tchibo - Pet Shops (The Bird Feeder, Pet, Koelle zoo, zoo, zoo + Co) - (Electronic Partner, Euronics, Expert, Media Markt, Medi Max, Saturn) - Construction and Garden (Bauhaus, Dehner, Globe, Hagebau, Hornbach, Max Bahr, Obi, Toom) - Department Stores (Galeria Kaufhof, Karstadt, Woolworth) - Special (MäcGeiz, Pfennigpfeiffer, Tedi, Thomas Philipps, Zimmermann) - Toys (Baby One Rofu, Toys-R-Us, Vedes) - Mobile (Telekom, o2, Vodafone, E-Plus ...) In addition, the following brochures are available for browsing: - Means (Danish bed camp Depot, Ikea, Poco, Porta, scooters, Segmüller, Sconto) - Fashion / Clothing (Takko, Deichmann, Ernstings Family, Intersport, Kik, NKD) You pick it - With YouPickIt! Visit us online: www.youpickit.de For suggestions and questions: write us at info@youpickit.de Your YouPickIt team

description: =========== Over 8 million downloads worldwide Your devices deserve an adorable and challenging game like Mandora! Featured in iTunes New and What's Hot Games categories in over 65 countries Over 100,000 5-star user reviews worldwide =========== Prepare to be charmed by Mandora! Welcome to Moonycat Village, the favorite location for wizards to practice their farming, and the only place in the world where Mandora seeds can be found. Mandoras are not only powerful magic ingredients, these creatures that blur the line between animal and plant, magic and science, are also grown by Moonycat villagers into fashionable accessories or pets for wizards. Within a mere few years, hundreds of species have been popularized in the world of sorcery. --Competing with Facebook friends in Survival Mode-- Not only the difficulty of the newly added Survival Mode increases as the game progresses, but there are also Wormees that bite Mandora leaves, hindering you from plucking. Collecting Golden Leaves gives you the chance to equip with magical props to survive as long as you can in the Forest. --Enjoy the Pleasure of Plucking in Endless Mode-- Play as a farmer in charge of harvesting ripe Mandoras. Pluck as many ripe Mandoras as you can within the time limit to score points. Successful combos may also yield bonus time items as well as rare Mandoras to collect. --An Adorable Game Diary-- Collected Mandoras are recorded in the Diary, an album with hand-drawn art and sound effects for the player to enjoy. Missing a couple of species in your collection? The Diary also offers hints! --Challenge Yourself-- Players are ranked each time based on the game’s scoring system. Can you achieve the highest rank in the game? Features: - Dazzling & challenging, using a variety of props to compete with Facebook friends for higher scores & rankings in Survival Mode - Simple, action-packed gameplay system in Endless Mode - More than 55 kinds of adorable Mandoras to collect - Diary with hand-drawn art — a gallery of your Mandoras collection - Farming Statistics — personal records and stats - Interactive tutorial — new players can pick up the game with ease - More than 60 game rankings based on your performance - Support for single-player as well as Game Center global leaderboards - Support for English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, French, Portuguese and Spanish - Discover new surprises by playing at different times of the day Mandora 2.0 Game Trailer: http://youtu.be/416Acx55VXo Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/rayark.Mandora Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/MandoraRayark Rayark Official Website: www.rayark.com
release_text: -Add four seasons to survival mode, no more clock adjustment on your device to obtain the new species! -Add 24 new species of summer and autumn, collect them all!

description: The "Button Clicker" game of has a simple goal: PRESS THE BUTTON!. Yes, when you start pressing the button you can't stop it ... NEW!: World Leaderboard! NEW!: Now two players Bluetooth game ! It's inspired in many web browser games like the "Cookie Clicker" or the "Candy Box". Just don't stop pressing the button. The good news is that there is a store where you can buy Automatons that will press the button for you. These automatons or robots will never stop pressing the button. You can purchase automata by spending some of your clicks (bank clicks). You can also buy upgrades to increase the performance of your clicks or upgrade the automatons production you have. ✔ You can choose to play single player (against time) or a duel between two players at a time limit, bluetooth game. ✔ Every time you get beat a time, your score will we recorded in the local mobile ranking. ✔ Game is automatically saved every 30 seconds. Also when you exit the game. Enjoy the game! Legal notice --------------- This application complies with the policies of Google Play content. This app is created just for the purpose of entertainment, its free and supported only by advertising. Any suggestion or bug report is welcome. Please, before writing a bad review contact us by email at: jdpapps@gmail.com Music: Copyright : Dj Rkod - Pulse ( George Ellinas Remix ) License: CC BY 3.0 . http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ George Ellinas : thank you very much for this incredible song Permissions required : - INTERNET : To access the advertising banners (Google AdMob) and for online rankings - BLUETOOTH : For two player games.
release_text: ◉ Graphics enhanced ◉ New game icon ◉ Size of apk reduced :) ◉ Reset scores. There was a bug that some people exploited to create fake records. ◉ Added EU cookie consent dialog (required by regulations).

description: Our application is a great chance to learn the basis of the foreign language fast and effectively. Unique study method. No more grinding repetitive words translation that will slip your mind soon. You're supposed to figure out the meaning like children learn to speak. They link what they hear with what they see and learn the meaning of each word or phrase comparing the differences between actions or things. Nail down the knowledge that you grasp with the help of writing tasks. The full version offers: - 30 lessons with increasing difficulty levels - 1800 words and phrases voiced by male and female native narrators - over 1500 colorful images There is a free version to try before you buy. It contains 3 lessons: from the beginning, middle and the end of the course. They are given to show the method and the course level that we offer About 5 million people all over the world have already chosen our application as a fair companion. Give it a try too! **Check out FAQ if you encounter any issues: http://learnlikekids.com/taxonomy/term/4 **

description: あなたのスマートフォン、タブレットに かしこい日本語を ATOK for Android へへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへ ◆ ATOK（エイトック）とは ◆ ・日本語を入力するみなさまに選ばれつづけて 　30年以上、ATOKは、ジャストシステムが 　日本語にひたむきに向き合って作っている 　日本語入力システムです へへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへ ◆ 基本機能 ◆ ・テンキー「ケータイ入力」「フリック入力」 　「ジェスチャー入力」「2タッチ入力」を用意 ・キーのサイズや位置を自由にカスタマイズ ・絵文字、顔文字、記号をすばやく入力 ・「いま」で時刻に「あした」で日付に変換 ・「こみゅにけーしょん」から英単語に変換 ・削除（×）キーの左フリックで文頭まで、 　上フリックで文末まで全削除 ・右（→）キー、左（←）キーの上下フリックで 　上下にカーソルを移動 ◆ 拡張機能 ◆ ［ATOK Sync］ 　・ATOK for Windows、Macと登録単語を共有 ［ATOK拡張辞書］ 　・顔文字辞書、和英辞書、文例辞書など、 　　入力が便利になる辞書を10個まで利用可能 　　※拡張辞書はGoogle Playで提供中 ［ATOKキーワードExpress］ 　・ニュースのキーワードや話題の有名人など、 　　経済・スポーツ・芸能のトレンドを変換 ［ATOKダイレクト for マッシュルーム］ 　・マッシュルームアプリと連携 へへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへ ▼ ご注意 ▼ ・［キーボードと入力方法］の設定でATOKをオンにすると、入力内容（パスワード、クレジットカード番号などの個人情報）の収集や、ユーザーインターフェースの操作の記録についてのメッセージが表示されますが、ATOKはこれらを一切行いません ・ご利用の機種、アプリケーションにより絵文字が入力できない場合があります ・絵文字パネルは、対応していないアプリケーションでは操作できない状態（グレーアウト）になります ・絵文字は、各携帯電話会社、メーカーの機種により表示が異なります ・ATOKをSDカードに移動した場合、SDカードをマウントしたときは、もう一度ATOKを使える状態に設定する必要があります ▼ 動作環境 ▼ ・Android 2.3/3.0/3.1/3.2/4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3/4.4/5.0/5.1/6.0 ・Android 4.1以上では、アプリケーションとの相性による問題が発生する場合があります ・Googleアプリ上でATOKが正常に動作しない場合は、Googleアプリのアップデートをお試しください http://support.justsystems.com/jp/products/atok_android/faq02.html#faq-68 ・Google Playから正常にダウンロードできない場合は次の手順をお試しください https://support.google.com/googleplay/troubleshooter/6241347 ▼ 対応機種 ▼ ・対応機種以外の機種、Root化・カスタムROMの機種、ハードウェアキーボードを内蔵した機種、外付けキーボードからの入力は、動作保証外です ・インテル®Atom™プロセッサー搭載機にも対応しています http://www.justsystems.com/jp/products/atok_android/spec.html?spec=system ▼ オンラインマニュアル ▼ よくある質問（FAQ） ▼ http://support.justsystems.com/jp/products/atok_android/#faq へへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへへ ・「ATOK」「推測変換」は、株式会社ジャストシステムの商標です ・その他記載された会社名、製品名等は、各社の登録商標もしくは商標、または株式会社ジャストシステムの商標です Your description: AMC Security (a.k.a Advanced Mobile Care) is a security and optimization app from IObit, which is the developer of the popular program Advanced SystemCare for Windows. It is the #1 All-in-one app to help protect your device from any potential threats, avoid sneak leak of your privacy and boost device performance to the top. Maybe you always have the following concerns: Several tool apps installed but only use a few of their features? Always find phones and tablets getting laggy and memory constrained? Worried about all kinds of new tricks and intrusions? Get lost and confused in other similar apps? AMC Security can solve them all! All-in-one AMC Security can replace similar apps in one go. One-tap Scan, Booster, Security comes with a handful of must-have tools that ensure your devices get a comprehensive protection. It is also more lightweight than you think. Scan Smart scan will let you clean all the running apps, cache junk, privacy records and useless APK files. Deep scan will let you clean junk files, big files and residual files. All the clean-up are in a few taps. It helps you have enough store space to take more pictures, videos and install apps. Antivirus AMC Security protects your device against viruses, trojans, vulnerabilities, malware and spyware. UI AMC Security always focus on simplicity and user friendliness. With new material design, you will find how neat and sleek it looks in a well structure. Other features in Booster and Security Phone Booster Help kill applications that are running in the background and clean up your RAM (memory) to boost up your device with one tap. Game Booster Improve your gaming speed and experience and smooth game play without lagging. Anti-Phishing IObit Cloud Services provides a plug-in which update in real time so that whenever you access a site that detected as phishing, it will help you keep the tricks outside. Anti-Theft Help lock and alarm your lost device immediately by sending a message with ‘alarm#’ and password from any other device. You still can locate and wipe data remotely if the above way failed to find your device. Payment Guard Help finds out copycat apps, so that you can uninstall them before money being stolen. Once you launch a payment app, it keeps protecting you all along in the background. Surfing Guard Block websites that contain malware, malicious URL and fraudulent content, and warn you instantly by IObit Cloud Services when heading to the danger. Security Guard Remind you to enable Wi-Fi Security which can check Wi-Fi’s encryption way, ARP spoofing, and even MITM. Also it reviews other important device settings and gives insecure advice. Sidebar will be provided with App Manager, Battery Saver, Call Blocker, Privacy Locker and more! Note: One AMC Security Pro account can be used on multiple devices at the same time since you update to version 5.0. Customer Services Here’s FAQs you may want to know: http://mobile.iobit.com/m/faq_v5 If you encounter any problems or have any suggestions in using AMC Security, please email us at: mobilesupport@iobit.com ) or tap Feedback to get a reply within 24 hrs. Join Google+ community to test the latest beta version and participate in improvement: https://goo.gl/GmV3z9 Follow us on Facebook to get AMC news, mobile tips and giveaway info: https://www.facebook.com/AdvancedMobileCare
release_text: 1. Much faster and lighter Antivirus Engine 2. Hibernate autostarting apps with 1-tap 3. Brand new Battery Saver – 3 Modes provided to greatly extend battery life. 4. More Powerful Scan and Booster 5. Fixed all known bugs

description: A nice looking and reliable 7 days weather forecast. It works for different places around the world and is able provide an accurate forecast in less than a few seconds. The application makes use of GPS to automatically display weather conditions for the user's current location. This location can be later on changed manually. It offers two different graphical templates for day and night. Weather forecasts are very accurate and updated every two hours. Currently supported languages: -English -Spanish -Polish -German -Italian -French More languages coming soon! If your language is missing and you would like to help with the translation, please contact us! If something is not working as it should, or you have some ideas for improvement, please also let us know!
release_text: new widget added

description: Take the real control. Test your piloting skills and manage the most critical flight conditions of history. Resolve emergencies and incidents inspired to real ones, in a crescendo of pure adrenaline. Start the individual engines, navigate between the equipment dashboards panels and be prepared to solve the over 5,000 possible situations to achieve the highest pilot level. The simulator includes 36 missions to accomplish, 216 challenges to pass, cartography and worldwide navigation with over 500 accurate airports and weather conditions in real time. Features: - 36 missions - 216 challenges of which 6 at global competition - 20 HD airports - Fast landing mode with global competition and 5 fault levels. - Instrument Landing System, ILS - Speed, Route, Altitude and vertical speed autopilot - Primary Flight Display - Navigation Display - Meteo Radar to manage Microburst, Ice and wind - Advanced engines system with ignition, faults and fire extinguisher - Fuel management with weight balancing, Jettison and real consumption - Landing gears management with manual unlocking system - Full control of the rudder, flaps, reversers and spoilers - APU management - Worldwide navigation with 548 airports and 1107 usable runways, real or customizable weather conditions - Cartography with over 8000 waypoints (VOR, NDB, TACAN, DME, GPS, FIX) - Flight Planning - Cinema replay system - 3D virtual cockpit with integrated instrumentation - SRTM30 Plus real terrestrial elevation - MODIS VCF real coast line - OpenWeatherMap real-time weather conditions
release_text: - 2 New planes/scenarios, BUSINESS JET (twin-engined) and OLD GLORY (propeller four-engined) - 3 New challenges: 'Wheeling', 'Close call' and 'Slalom'

description: Receive instant notifications for each new post published on Cuneotrekking.com. Cuneotrekking.com is the online reference point for hiking in the South-Western Alps. Hundreds of routes of all lengths and difficulties in the province of Cuneo. With descriptions, photos, GPS tracks, and useful news. And with an innovative tool that helps you to choose your next hike in seconds. Cuneotrekking.com is also known for its in-depth reviews and guides of products related to the mountains.

description: Quest'app non è ufficiale. E' uno sviluppo amatoriale pensato per accellerare i tempi di download/apertura degli orari Co.Tra.L. Nell'app sono presenti anche le informazioni dettagliate su TUTTI i biglietti ed abbonamenti Co.Tra.L. & Metrebus piu le informazioni sulle zone tariffarie con tanto di immagine esplicativa e lista con tutti i comuni del lazio con relativa zona di appartenenza. I comuni nell'app sono divisi in 3 categorie principali: -Capolinea di Roma -Capolinea nel Lazio (con ulteriore suddivisione per lettera) -Capolinea Fuori del Lazio. nel menù, accessibile dalla pagina principale e dalle 3 categorie principali, sarà possibile avere accesso al sito ufficiale della Co.Tra.L. Spa e alla pagina relativa alle zone tariffarie, ad un'About e alla funzione di uscita. Quando si clicca su un comune apparirà un'avviso con 3 pulsanti: -Scarica: l'app si collegherà online per scaricare il file .pdf in vigore al momento del download N.B. se è presente già un file vecchio dello stesso comune sul telefono, l'app aggiornerà il file presente. -Apri: da usare solamente se è già presente l'appropriato file in memoria. l'app cercherà tutti i lettori di pdf presenti sullo smartphone android e chiederà quale usare per aprire il file, oppure lo aprirà con l'app predefinita dall'utente (se ne è impostata una - Io raccomando Adobe Reader). -Indietro: chiude semplicemente l'avviso. C'è la possibilità di spostare il contenuto dell'app sulla memoria SD esterna, permettendo di occupare meno memoria sul telefono. (da 1,74 MB a 284 KB) I suggerimenti su come migliorare l'app sono sempre apprezzati, mi impegnerò al massimo per venire incontro alle future esigenze. Grazie per aver scaricato questa applicazione. ~Versione 1.1 °Controllo licenza implementato in modo più sicuro. Bisogna essere online al primo avvio dell'app.
release_text: ~Versione 1.1 °Controllo licenza implementato in modo più sicuro.

description: NightNDay Live Wallpaper is an immersive experience for your background. Using the phone's sensors, it orients a 3D camera in any direction transforming your background to a window into a beautifully rendered tropical paradise. Using your network-provided location (GPS wastes the battery) the app calculates the time of day for sunrise and sunset, and the environment adapts to the current real-world sky conditions. Future updates will include animated sun, moon, and weather-dependent skies! Tilt your device to look at the scene in any direction or swipe the screen to rotate the scene as you change pages on your home screen. Check back later to see the scene update to the current time of day, with accurate sunrise/sunset times based on your current location. Too much going on for your background? Disable the tilt feature or lock it to vertical rotation only. Adjust sensitivities and a plethora of other settings. Network location provider flaky? Set your latitude and longitude manually. This app is highly customizable. Future updates will include the ability to load your own photospheres and skybox images from your phone or the web!
release_text: Initial release: -14 day/night scenes -Adjustable tilt/swipe/idle sensitivities -Tilt clamp features

description: Bring prosperity – and hilarity – to your village in this utterly enthralling farming game! Ready to hoe your way to happiness? Plant fruit trees and herbs, care for crops and perfect your fishing skills so that your villagers are never hungry. Create a village layout that’s suitable for agriculture, with new barns, workshops and other buildings. Cooperate with your friends so that you all thrive and succeed in this funny world of farms, crafts and trade! YOU CAN UNLOCK ADDITIONAL BONUSES VIA IN-APP PURCHASE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! ● FARM! – 17 crops to cultivate on your farms ● CRAFT! – Produce goods and tools to grow the economy ● BUILD! – 55+ special buildings to construct ● DECORATE! – 220+ decorations to spruce up your village ● DEFEND! – 14 enemies to fight with all your might ● VISIT! – Catch up with friends and help each other out ● Google Play game services support Plunge into the fastest growing farming simulation game on the Google Play today! _______________________________________ Game available in: English, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish _______________________________________ COMPATIBILITY NOTES: ***Note*** This game supports high-end smartphones and tablets such as Nexus 7 and Nexus 10. _______________________________________ VISIT US: www.g5e.com WATCH US: www.youtube.com/g5enter FIND US: www.facebook.com/g5games FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/g5games

description: ＊科学する子供の未来を応援! 無料です！星座と神話の世界をお楽しみください。 「88星座図鑑」は、自由研究応援サイト「スタディスタイル★自然学習館」が提供するとってもシンプルな星座学習用アプリです。 -------------------------------------- ＊内容を気に入っていただけましたら、広告の入らない通常版へアップグレードして、親子でお楽しみください。 -------------------------------------- 全天88星座に関する基本データやオリジナルの星座絵をご覧いただけるシンプルなポケット星座図鑑です。おもに、小中学生の天体の授業の副教材として、星座や天文の学習に役立つ内容となっています。天文のマメ知識や、星座にまつわる神話など、美しい星座絵と共にご紹介していますので、星空をながめながら親子でお楽しみください。 お子様でも読めるように、できるだけ平易な表現を心掛けていますが、天文学のちょっと難しい内容もありますので、お父さん、お母さんがフォローしてあげてください。 今、星座がどの辺に見えるのかが分かる楽しい「星座レーダー」機能が有料アイテムで用意されています（一部の小型スマートフォンのみ対象）。星座レーダーを使って、親子で星座を探してみませんか？ 【主な特徴】 ・全天88星座の基本データや解説、星座絵を収録 ・主な流星群の基本データを収録 ・太陽系の主な天体の基本データを収録 ・星座学習に必要な、天文の基礎知識を分かりやすいイラストと共に紹介 ・主な天文イベント一覧を収録（流星群、日食、月食情報など） ・季節の星座、日本から見えない星座、大きな星座トップ10など、星座を様々な角度から分類して紹介 ・現在の星座や流星群の位置が分かる「星座レーダー」を一部の機種向けにオプション搭載 ・天文イベントのGoogleカレンダー登録、通知設定機能（Android4.0以降） ・本日の暦、今月の暦、月齢カレンダー表示機能（Android4.0.xを除く） ・お気に入りの星座の登録機能 など ※本アプリは、アンドロイダー公認アプリです https://androider.jp/official/app/4f0d273ca944b6f5/ 【星座レーダーについて】 　星座レーダー（有料アイテム）は、下記の条件を満たす小型スマートフォンが対象となります。（ファブレット、タブレット端末は対象外） 　　・Android2.3.3以降 　　・GPS、磁気センサー、加速度センサーを搭載していること 　　・画面の幅が320dip以上であること 　対象となる端末の場合にのみ、星座の解説画面のオプションメニューに「星座レーダー」が追加されます。メニューに表示されない場合は、現時点では非対応となりますので、あらかじめご了承ください。 　なお、一度の購入で全星座の星座レーダーが使えます（星座毎に購入する必要はございません）。 　 【注意事項】 ・日本国内での利用を想定した解説、機能となっています。 ・解説には正確を期すよう努めておりますが、内容を保証するものではございません。 ・解説は制作した時点によるものです。その後の研究等により変更となっている場合がございます。 ・星座レーダーの精度は電子コンパスの精度に依存します。磁気の影響の少ない場所でご利用ください。 ・星座レーダーによる星座の位置には各種誤差が含まれます。星座のおよその位置を知るためのガイドとしてご利用下さい。 ・GoogleAnalyticsによる個人情報を含まない統計、エラー情報を機能改善に役立てます。 * To support the future of children to science! description: Hangman (Hang The Pirate!) - filipino version Hang the pirate! Or rather do as much as possible to prevent to do it! We've prepared for you a new filipino version of Hangman with awesome graphics! With realistic sounds and funny animations - feel like on a Caribbean island and win before the pirate will be hang. Guess the hidden phrases by selecting letters. Each incorrect letter is one element of the hangman. Do not let the pirate hang! Modes: - One Player Select a category (or all) and guess random phrases. You have one hint for every phrase. Select the level of difficulty. - Two players Play with a friend. Think up a phrase for your opponent. You can draw phrases too, until you find the one that you like. The winner is the one who guesses more phrases. Categories: Geography – check if you know names of the countries and cities. Food – if you love cooking – this category is just for you! Music – for those who like both classic and popular music. Film - movies are your passion? How well do you know the movies, actors and directors? Test yourself! Animals – wild, domestic, small, big – guess all of them! Plants – many names of common and rare species. Sport – check your knowledge about sports disciplines Look – everything connected with clothes and people’s appearance. Art – architecture, painting – for those who have artistic soul! Have a lot of fun with our version of Hangman!

description: Thermometer App is a very useful application that lets you know real temperature and the humidity in the air thanks to sensors that are included in your device, They are real data based on your location with your phone at any time.No data taken from internet , so make sure your device includes temperature sensor and humidity sensor that will function as a hygrometer, before use the application. Normally other applications thermometers showing temperature, they do based on external data, showing a rough measure and always outside. With this app you will know the temperature of a room or a house in particular, helping you identify the ideal temperature at which you feel most comfortable. Real weather app. This type of sensors do not yet include many devices, the Samsung Galaxy S4 being one of the first, and now the Galaxy Note 3, which were developed for this application. Use only on devices with a real temperature sensor. Thermometer inside. Weather app This is a free version, there is a paid version of this app with widgets and no advertising.
release_text: V 3.3.5 Fixed External weather V 3.2 Bug Fixes V 3.1 Added pressure sensor. V 3.0 A new function added that shows the outside temperature and humidity data.It´s an optional function where you can choose between the sensor device data or a combination of the phone sensor plus the new function added. V2- New Look and Feel. Added Background change from camera, Gallery.

description: Con Cocina Perú Premium tienes acceso sin publicidad a todas nuestras recetas. Cocina Perú te enseña a preparar los platillos más deliciosos de la gastronomía peruana, considerada como una de las mejores del mundo, esta aplicación cuenta con recetas que van desde las más tradicionales hasta las de creación contemporánea, las cuales se han inspirado en la riquísima variedad cultural y ecológica que goza el Perú y en la creatividad de su gente. Los platos han sido agrupados en tres categorías: Entradas, platos de fondo y postres; así mismo se presentan en un estilo elegante y divertido que hacen a la aplicación muy intuitiva y fácil de usar. Cocina Perú es una aplicación OFF-LINE así que podrás buscar cualquier receta sin necesidad de estar conectado a internet. Sorprende a tus familiares con comidas exquisitas y novedosas o comparte un momento entretenido cocinando con tus amistades. "Cocina Perú, descubre el gusto". La app Cocina Perú ha sido desarrollada por Hartas Apps. With Premium Peru kitchen without advertising have access to all our recipes. Peru kitchen teaches you to prepare the most delicious dishes of Peruvian cuisine, considered one of the best in the world, this application has recipes ranging from the traditional to the contemporary creation, which have been inspired by the rich variety cultural and ecological enjoying Peru and creativity of its people. The plates have been grouped into three categories: inputs, main courses and desserts, likewise presented in an elegant and fun that make very intuitive and easy to use. Kitchen Peru is an OFF-LINE application so you can find any recipe without an Internet connection. Surprise your family with delicious and innovative meals or entertaining cooking shares a moment with your friends. "Cooking Peru, discover the taste." The kitchen Peru app has been developed by Hartas Apps.
release_text: - Incorporación de recetas y otras optimizaciones - Mejoras en el diseño - Comparte en redes sociales

description: Dedaloop is a digital board game for the entire family. Find your way through six missions on an every-turn-changing maze. Play solo or with your friends (up to 4 players on the same device) in two fantastic, hand-drawn environment: a jolly-like pirates theme and a more geekish steampunk theme! Dedaloop is a light strategy game with some puzzle elements. The simple rules and addictive game mechanics make it perfect for family play or a relaxing solo session. All graphics and soundtracks are original and have been made from scratch. Each player has six object to reach. Only one object at a time can be seen; when you reach your current one, you can look to the next. The first player who completes the missions and comes back to the the starting point wins. Features - Never play the same game twice - Play solo against the computer - Local multiplayer - Up to 4 players on the same device with Pass'n'Play - 2 hand-drawn game theme

description: Kids and toddlers will enjoy learning numbers and the alphabet with this easy app. The app menu is divided in 4 sections: in the first two sections of this educational games, each letter of the alphabet and number is shown both graphically and auditorially, joined with funny drawings helping the kids get the target knowledge. In the other 2 sections, kid are encouraged to write each number or letter (these are shown both in upper and lower case) connecting the dots. Funny educational games for kids 2, 3, 4 years old. To expand knowledge, you can choose the language. Currently available in English and Spanish.
release_text: Improvements in the tabs of the writing section with guides by arrows and numbers to facilitate the realization of strokes

description: USA TODAY named Calculator Plus among its "25 Essential Apps", calling it the "handy calculator app that's garnered great user ratings" I'm Calculator Plus - the perfect calculator for Android. I'm easy to use and beautifully designed to do things better than your phone or pocket calculator ever did. I'm big, easy to read, and I love saving you time and effort. I remember everything you calculate, and let you bring it up anytime, making me perfect for shopping, doing homework, paying the bills, or just helping out during the day. And if you need to go take care of something else, I'll have it all waiting for you when you come back. You'll never need to type the same calculation twice again. I'm attractive and effective and I make great use of your big, beautiful display: - I show your calculations in clear, elegant type that's easy to read, with commas just where they should be - You'll never lose track of where you are in a calculation - I show you exactly what's happening at all times - I remember everything, so you can take a break, then come back later and pick up where you left off - You can use backspace anytime to correct a simple mistake, instead of starting over - Use memory to keep a running total you can actually see - Swipe the memory keys aside if you need more advanced math functions - My percentage key shows exactly what it did, so you're not left confused - My intuitive, lovable design makes it simple to do everyday calculations on your phone or tablet Let Calculator Plus on your phone or tablet finally put that handheld calculator to rest. Calculator Plus (C) 2015 Digitalchemy, LLC

description: 「聖剣伝説」最新作が、スマートフォンに登場！ -------------------------------------------------- 『聖剣伝説RISE of MANA』は、1991年に発売された『聖剣伝説～ファイナルファンタジー外伝～』から続く、『聖剣』シリーズの最新作です。今作は、シリーズを通して受け継がれる独特な世界観と多彩なアクションをウリにして、更にパワーアップした完全新作RPGです。 -------------------------------------------------- ■ストーリー プレイヤーは、とある事件により一つの体になってしまった天使と悪魔の二人を動かして、多彩なフィールドを冒険しながら物語を進めていきます。何故二人は一つの体になってしまったのか。故郷である天界に帰るにはどうしたらいいのか。多くの謎や外の世界から現れる巨大な敵に立ち向かいながら、カギを握る存在『聖剣』を求めて、彼らの冒険が始まります。 ■ゲームの特徴 ・リアルタイムレイドバトル フレンド達とリアルタイムに協力して、巨大ボスを倒そう！ 倒せればレアなアイテムがゲットできるかも！？ ・転身 一つの体に、天使と悪魔、二つの心が同化している主人公。 二つの姿を自在に操り、ダンジョンやバトルを潜り抜けよう！ ・武器 剣、槍、弓、ナックル、大剣の5種類の武器を使い分けよう！ 属性も組み合わせればさらに戦闘が有利に！ ・魔ペット 個性豊かなモンスターを「魔ペット」として連れて行こう！ 魔ペット達は一緒に戦ってくれるぞ！ ・多彩な操作インターフェース 直観的な操作がウリのタッチ操作モード、家庭用ゲーム機の様な操作感を実現したバーチャルパッドモードを採用。 -------------------- 【対応OS】 Android OS 4.0以上 【動作確認済み機種】 http://an.sqexm.net/sp/site/Page/sqmk/rom/correspond ※今後、動作確認ができた端末については、推奨端末として随時追加してまいります。なお､記載されていない非推奨端末につきましては動作の確認がおこなえていないため、動作の保証はしておりません。ご注意下さい。 ※レイドバトルは機種によって同時プレイ人数が制限される場合が御座います。 長時間プレイされた時に動作が不安定になったり、アプリが強制終了されてしまう場合が御座います。 大変お手数をお掛けいたしますが、以下の点にご注意の上、お楽しみいただけますようお願い申し上げます。 ・プレイを中断する時はアプリをマルチタスクからも完全に終了させてください。 ・端末を再起動することで改善される場合があります。 ・au3G回線をご利用されている場合、ゲームファイルダウンロードにて、極端に時間がかかることが御座います。 アプリのデータ更新等でダウンロードが完了しないという場合、Wi-Fiでのダウンロードを推奨いたします。 【お問い合わせ】 http://support.jp.square-enix.com/main.php?la=0&id=9461 -------------------- "Seiken Densetsu" latest works, appeared in the smartphone! -------------------------------------------------- "Seiken Densetsu RISE of MANA" continues from "Seiken Densetsu Final Fantasy Gaiden ~" was released in 1991, it is the latest installment of the "Holy sword" series. description: To Do Log was featured (globally) by Android Market in September/October 2011 and was top featured productivity App. ✔ To Do Log To Do log is a to-do list and "not to-do list" in one. You assign points (either negative or positive) to tasks; then work to get the highest score over time by both doing things you want to do and avoiding those you shouldn't do. You can use it both for things you want to do and those you don't (so it is idea for new year resolutions, health or diet plans etc). ✔ Quick and flexible recording You can easily add new repeating or one off items, mark them as done and record past occurrences of items. You can also add notes with additional information (and edit them later). ✔ Graphs for analysis Later you can view graphs showing when you get stuff done, when you are most likely to get distracted or do negative things. By learning this you can take action to better achieve your goals. You can export and import your data to and from external storage/sd card ✔ Recent Update I've recently updated To Do Log for Android 4.0 upwards; this is now the vast majority of devices. But older devices can still use the previous version of the App. ✔ What users think of the App: "Great app. App works and looks great. I really like the point system and it allowed me to better hold myself responsible for my habits." Maurene "Highly recommended... This is my favorite self-improvement app. It allows to you to track behaviors in real time and see rapid improvement. Simply brilliant." Bird
release_text: 11.0 First update for Android Lollipop 5.0+ along with some other tweaks for all Android 4.0+ devices. 9.0 Redesigned UI for recent Android devices. On Android 4.0 and above now uses custom themed action bar. Various other changes for 4.0+.

description: InvoiceProManager is the most complete and easiest customers, quotes, invoices and products/articles management. This application is going to make your life easier by offering a variety of management features like generation, monitoring, and statistical export of your estimates and invoices. You are artisan, independent, micro, small or medium business, auto entrepreneur, professional, InvoiceProManager was designed for you in a way adjustable to give you the ability to easily manage your products and to add in your invoices and estimates that the useful information such as: TVA, TAX, VAT, SIRET, ... To save time, InvoiceProManager allows you to easily export and import your products/articles from an Excel file based on a template file. In addition to basic functions, InvoiceProManager can easily generate your invoice and your quotes in a PDF file and send it to your customer with a single click. You want to export your invoices and/or quotes paid or not? With InvoiceProManager you can filter your quotes/invoices and export them to Excel or CSV file for incorporation into another external tool. With the feature of statistics, you can track your sales monthly or yearly and compare it with previous years. InvoiceProManager is a comprehensive tool that will simplify your financial management and accounting of your business. Features: - Customer Management - Quote Management - Invoice Management - Management of paying bills/invoices - Transform quote to invoice - Generation of invoice or quote to PDF - Sending of quotes and invoices by email - Export quotes and invoices to an Excel or CSV file - Sending of exports by email - Management Setup: logo, company stamp, currency, tax, ... - Statistics of sales per day, month, year and customer - Ability to add a customer from a contact. - Product/articles Management - Management category of products - Import/Export products - Ability to add invoice/quote lines from the products - Ability to change the number of the invoice/quote - Import/Export customers (For more information, look at this video of the application StockPromanager: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cdd9ITRuyC8 ) - Ability to add discount by invoice and by details - Generation catalogs produced in PDF - Attaching a document PDF (data sheet) with the product - Scan bar code of products - Save and restore Database - Possibility of signing a quote http://www.facebook.com/pages/Invoice-Pro-Manager/492792920754220 To improve this application, please send me your requests to add features, feedback, comments or bugs/problems ( askeranis@gmail.com ).

description: A modern take on the classic board game. Enjoy the world famous draughts board game (also known as checkers) in the palm of your hand. Experience a modern looking game with precise controls and fluent graphics. Draughts has multiple game modes like Challenge and Freeplay. In Challenge mode you fight through many levels against an increasingly stronger AI opponent. If you want to choose your enemies strength directly, try the Freeplay mode. And finally you can compete with a friend on one device in Heads Up mode. Draughts features: * Great looking modern UI with phone and tablet support * Responsive and fast controls * Easy to learn with in-game ui hints * Support for portrait AND landscape mode * Multiple game modes with increasing level of difficulty * Google Play Games support for leaderboards, achievements, player name and cloud sync * Support for 8x8 and 10x10 board sizes * Multiple rule variants * Analyze your performance with match replay * Exhaustive game statistics * Accessibility support We hope you are enjoying the game as much as we do and welcome any kind of feedback. If Checkers crahses always at a certain point, you have a nasty bug from an old version. Please uninstall the app and install fresh from the store. Sorry for the inconvenience.

description: Thank you to everyone who has donated. This application is provided free of charge. The project can only be worked on in my spare time but I do try to help people who email me with problems they are having. Please remember this before leaving negative feedback, constructive criticism is always appreciated. Thank you for your support. Application to display Bitcoin Price information sourced from Bitcoin Charts: http://www.bitcoincharts.com On start up the application will download the current prices. The user can then set up Home screen widgets with any of the listed markets. The widgets will update every 15 minutes, this can be changed in Settings. Widgets can be selected to display the full market details. We have had quite a few comments about the amount of data usage. Unfortunately Bitcoin Charts that supply the data for this app only allow downloading all the exchanges as one large block and the size of this increase as new exchanges are added. Their server does not appear to support compression which makes this more of a problem. At the time of writing July 2013 with Bitcoin Prices 1.3.3, each update uses approximately 30kB of data. So with an Update Frequency of 15 minutes and a few manual updates during the day, the app can consume over 3MB/day. We do provide a 'WiFi Only' option but appreciate that a WiFi Access Point is not always available. If you like this App, find it useful and want to keep me motivated working on it then please consider donating whatever you think it is worth to you: 1NuvRn89P5tYmUTfcL5WSu5BwduqpmpkoH Please post suggestions or issues to: http://groups.google.com/group/lostdroids This software is provided 'as-is', without any express or implied warranty. In no event will the author be held liable for any damages arising from the use of this software. Please Note: This application requires access to the internet to retrieve price information and your network service provider may charge for such data transmissions. We will not be held liable for any charges incurred.
release_text: 1.3.7 Converted to new style widgets for later Android devices. Changed icon to Google recommend style. Improved back button handling. Fixed formatting of Currency Volume. Hides exchanges which haven't updated for 2 months. Minor bug fixes. 1.3.5 Supported new Bitcoin Charts URL which will resolve the issue of the app not updating prices. Bitcoin Charts now supports compression so this should reduce data usage.

description: *** 50% OFF for a Limited Time Only *** 10bii Financial Calculator is a powerful financial calculator for Android, which supports all functions of HP 10bII Financial Calculator and beyond. With more than 120 functions for financial analysis, business, statistics, and mathematics, and modeled on the popular HP 10bII Financial Calculator, 10bii Financial Calculator app combines precise mathematics, intuitive display, and ease-of-use in one package. It allows you to easily calculate time value of money, amortization, investment value, mortgage and loan payments, interest rates, and more using powerful and intuitive worksheets. *** Highlight Features *** • Time Value of Money TVM • Amortization • Cash flow analysis: Net Present Value (NPV), and Internal Rate of Return (IRR) • Mortgage and Loan payment calculation • Business percentage calculation like Cost, Price, Margin, and Markup • Interest Rate Conversion between Nominal and Annual Effective Interest Rates • Statistical analysis • 10 Memories for storage • Choice of Chain and Algebraic Calculation Mode • Scientific capabilities, including log, exponent, power etc • Key click sound feedback • N, I/YR, PV, PMT and FV values displayed right above buttons • One-click access to settings, user manual, and customer support within the app • More ... **** Support **** Feel free to email us at support@vicinno.com whenever you need help. **** Stay tuned **** Like us: www.facebook.com/vicinno Follow us: www.twitter.com/vicinno

description: *****Top Seller***** Over 2 Million Downloads!!! Be comfortable around crowds. Stop anxiety and be confident and in control. You can put an end to social and dating anxiety today with hypnosis . This “End Social Phobias” app from hypnotherapist Erick Brown gives you all of the benefits of a hypnosis session -- on the go! Listen to “End Social Phobias Hypnosis ” at any time of day to create peace, emotional control, and relaxation in any social situation. It’s easy to use, relaxing, and hypnosis is proven to give lasting results. Just lay back and listen, and let yourself enjoy soothing background sounds and vocals. The positive changes will happen even if you fall asleep! This app features: * Soothing, therapeutic hypnotherapy tracks from world-renowned hypnotherapist Erick Brown * High quality, state of the art recordings  * Hypnosis instructions that can be opted out of once you have learned how hypnosis works * Your choice of a short or long hypnosis induction * Your choice of one of eight different soothing background animations and sounds to enhance your hypnosis experience * Two volume bars to adjust the hypnosis audio and background audio separately for a more user-friendly experience * Each session can be customized with the option to listen to the hypnosis track up to 11 times * Customizable wake or sleep endings: - The option to wake you up when the program has finished - A built-in alarm clock to wake up at a particular time  - Program the app to allow you to remain asleep after completing hypnosis  * In-app store with multiple applications for purchase, from weight loss to attracting love Erick Brown and his team have worked hard to ensure that whatever you need to make your self-hypnosis session as effective as possible has been included. Use hypnosis and hypnotherapy to help you lose weight, gain energy, sleep better and increase your confidence and self-esteem so that you feel better, sexier, happier and more motivated! Testimonials: "Erick Brown starts off with a very thorough hypnosis induction, taking the time to bring you into a deep, relaxed hypnotic state. His voice is very soothing and pleasant, and he takes you deep, deep into a heightened state of receptiveness on the subconscious level. The visualization or guided imagery leads you to a beautiful, safe and comfortable place, a haven from the outside world, of your own imagining all the while Erick is bringing you deeper into relaxation. He then begins to suggest change, enforcing the idea that you want to change, that your weight is preventing you from living the life you want and deserve. It’s done very well, it’s not negative or judgmental, and it’s not rushed like some hypnosis recordings. If I were asked to rate this download right now I would give it 5 stars." (Aunt Jean's Cafe, www.auntjeanscafe.com) “This one's so relaxing, I fell asleep listening to it during the relaxation exercise. I trust Erick Brown's hypnosis suggestions, I've listened to many of them and they're very good.” (Shalla DeGuzman, Editor, Shalla Magazine. Bamberg, Germany)

description: Fly with Cid and view the worlds of FINAL FANTASY IV! CID'S AERIAL VIEWS is an interactive map guide app that allows you view the world maps of the classic 16-BIT RPG game, FINAL FANTASY IV. View world maps such as the OVERWORLD, UNDERWORLD, and the RED MOON and use multi-touch gestures and buttons to zoom in and out. FEATURES • View colorful 16-bit world maps from the classic 16-BIT RPG game, FINAL FANTASY IV. • Supports multi-touch gestures such as pinch in/out and double tap to zoom in and out. • Interface is designed to mimic the 16-BIT FINAL FANTASY IV interface. • Features music and sound effects directly from FINAL FANTASY IV. • Supports English, Japanese, and Korean languages. REQUIREMENTS • ANDROID VERSION: Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) and above is supported. Please note that Gingerbread devices are restricted to LOW GRAPHICS mode. • SCREEN DISPLAY: 320p and larger display resolutions are supported. • GRAPHICS: 4K x 4K Texture Support (Adreno 225+, Mali-400MP4+, PowerVR SGX 543+, Tegra 4+). Older GPUs that only support 2K x 2K textures (Tegra 1/2/3) may be restricted to MEDIUM GRAPHICS mode with GPU hardware acceleration disabled. • MEMORY: 1024 MB and above recommended for optimal performance. Please note that devices with less than 1024 MB may be restricted to LOW GRAPHICS mode. CID'S AERIAL VIEWS is a fan application and is not associated with or endorsed by SQUARE ENIX. © FINAL FANTASY is a registered trademark of Square Enix Co., Ltd. All FINAL FANTASY images, logos, names, music, and related media are intellectual properties of SQUARE ENIX unless otherwise noted.

description: WorkSmart is a must have app for anyone who is planning a successful career or seeking a promotion at work. WorkSmart helps you keep track of all your work accomplishments, and have a status report ready to be emailed at any time. It is an innovative and easy way to be organized and stay goal-oriented throughout your busy work day. How does it work? Simply enter your accomplishments into WorkSmart at the end of your day. You may assign these accomplishments to different business goals for the week, month, quarter or even the year, and you can track your accomplishments on daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly basis. The accomplishment list that you create using WorkSmart makes it easy for you to communicate your progress and productivity to your manager. **TESTIMONIALS** “Awesome tool, this will be extremely useful not only at annual performance appraisal time, but also through out the year. All your accomplishments in one place, well organized!” Cindy Gomez, Senior Technical Project Manager “WorkSmart really made a difference when it came time for my monthly and quarterly reviews. It had everything I recorded, formatted, and ready to show my manager." Kevin N Lam, ASIC, Chip, Package Design, Signal-integrity, & Methodology Guru “Traveling is a large part of my job and using WorkSmart makes keeping track of my progress effortless. This app saves me time and also allows me to be more focused at work. I would highly recommend every professional to use the WorkSmart app.” Maung Than, Senior SOA Architect / Consultant ** WATCH A VIDEO** See a video on the app: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_5x7PLd-L4M **FEATURES** - Keep track of work accomplishments - View accomplishments by date (daily, weekly, monthly or yearly) - Enter goals by priorities (high, medium, low) and by due dates - Enter sub-goals - View goals by priorities - Create status report of daily, weekly, monthly and yearly goals - Create status report of daily, weekly, monthly and yearly accomplishments - Email status reports, accomplishments, and goals

description: ★★YOU MUST HAVE UCCW INSTALLED TO USE THIS SKIN★★ If you have any problems, please do not rate low. The majority of the problems users face is from not knowing where a setting is in UCCW. Please first view the video and then email me with any problems and I can usually figure out what is going on and get back to you within a few hours. As always, I am open to feedback and suggestions on how to make this widget better for its users. Permissions are due to 4.1+ workaround. You can read more about it here: http://goo.gl/OWbfb ★INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS★ Please view the video in screenshots or follow the below instructions. The video and instructions will be the same for all of my skins. There is a problem with paid UCCW Skins on 4.1+ devices. In order to get this skin to show up on these devices, I have changed the app to a skin installer. (Note: you must have Allow installation of apps from unknown sources checked under Settings - Security for the skin installer to successfully launch the skin apk.) 1) Download and install the skin installer app from this Google Play listing. 2) After downloading and installing this skin installer app, click the "Open" button in the Google Play listing. 3) A skin installation app will launch. In the skin installer, select Install Skin. 4) A new app installation will now launch and you can proceed to install the skin as you would a normal apk. ★ADDING THE SKIN TO YOUR HOMESCREEN★ One of the most frequent issues users email me about is that the skin is not showing up for them. Paid UCCW skins from the Google Play store only show up in one location (when adding a uccw widget). To add the skin to your homescreen follow these instructions. (Please note, these instructions will work for the majority of users but in some situations, the methods might be a little different due to different launchers.) 1) Long press in an open spot on your homescreen and select "Widgets". 2) Scroll down until you see the different UCCW sizes available. 3) Select the appropriate size from the list for the skin you are adding. 4) UCCW will now open a list of installed skins including paid UCCW skins from the Google Play Store (this is the only place the paid skins will show up). 5) Select from the list the skin which you wish to add. 6) On your homescreen a hand pointing to a blue dot will now appear with the words "Touch here" written below. Tap on the hand. 7) The skin will now appear on your homescreen. To change certain skin settings (colors, hotspot settings, time format, etc) with hotspots deactivated, tap anywhere on the skin. You can now pick many color options and pick your favorite apps to launch from the hotspots (note: be sure to activate hotspots before you exit the settings by hitting the menu button and select "Lock Widgets (Hotspot mode) and select "On"). If you have any issues or problems installing the skin, please first view the video and then email me and I will get back to you as soon as I can.

description: This is an emulator for the Intel 8080, probably the most popular CPU of the 1970s. To prove the emulator works, here it executes the machine code for the Space Invaders game released by Taito in 1978. One or two reviewers have commented that it isn't that difficult to write a Space Invaders game for modern mobile devices, but I think they miss the point! This app isn't primarily a Space Invaders game, it's an emulator for the Intel 8080 running on top of the Android OS. It just so happens the emulator loads and executes the original Space Invaders object code, but it could execute other 8080 code. For instance, I don't see any reason why the emulator could not be used as the basis of running the venerable CP/M Operating System on an Android (MS-DOS would require an 8086 emulator). NB: This app uses Adobe AIR (Adobe Integrated Runtime). AIR is essentially the web FlashPlayer code, but packaged as a standalone product. Many very popular apps on the playstore use AIR, for example 'Candy Crush Soda Saga' and 'Empire: Four Kingdoms', but you don't realise this as developers often package the runtime as part of the download. I don't package this app with the runtime for three reasons: i) By having you download the runtime you will get bug and vulnerability fixes from Adobe as soon as they are made available. If I packaged the runtime with the app (as many developers do), you would have to wait for me to publish a new version of the app to get these fixes. ii) The Adobe runtime is quite big (about 9 meg). If I packaged AIR with this app, its size would increase from about 300k to over 9meg! iii) The AIR runtime is SHARED. You download it once, and any app that needs AIR will use the download (and that download will be updated by Adobe as and when required). Background: This emulator was originally developed by Thibault Imbert ( http://www.bytearray.org/?p=622 ). This code ran perfectly on my PC but was EXTREMELY slow on my Samsung Galaxy Tab. All I've done is a bit of "tweaking", and added a few buttons - all credit to Thibault! As already mentioned this app is NOT for you if you are looking for an ultra fast implementation of Space Invaders, possibly with lots of 'improved' features. That is not its intention. Don't forget this app is primarily an emulator for the Intel 8080 CPU. Here it just so happens to be running the original Space Invaders object code. A note about colour: The original game ran in monochrome, all the objects were white on a black background. The illusion of colour (the green protective bunkers) was obtained using green cellophane strips! I apologise, but I am not in a position to supply you all with green cellophane strips to stick on your Android screens to change the colour of the protective bunkers! I will see if this effect can be implemented at screen copy time without slowing things down too much! This app is free and does not send you a single ad! It doesn't store your IP address or any other information about you whatsoever! PS: don't leave this app running in the background. Stop it, or it will deplete your battery really quickly! I will fix this in an update.
release_text: v1.4 - An annoying bug where the player would keep moving (possibly in the reverse direction) when left or right button was released. This fix makes this much less likely to occur. If you find this update fixes the problem you've been too polite to complain about, let me know by mailing me at graham.jolley.apps@gmail.com . Thanks!

description: Recommended by Katie Couric as an APP-solutely fabulous baby app for moms! Help your baby relax, stop crying, and sleep better. Includes perfectly looped sounds that your baby will love such as taking a car ride, classical music, conch shell, and doppler ultrasound of the womb. Need to quiet your baby while out in public? Try our baby rattle that includes complex shapes and fun sounds that will be sure to entertain. Need our sleeping sounds to activate when baby starts crying? Our Baby Monitor will do just that. White Noise Baby has so many great features, requested from parents like you, for your baby to enjoy! Features - Perfectly looped ambient sounds to help your baby sleep - Baby mode notification to reduce interruptions - High Contrast Baby rattle with touch and shake controls to quiet a fussy baby - Sound shutoff timer (fades volume to silence) with baby monitor restart - Baby monitor will reactivate timer and play sound if crying is detected - Event log of noise detection helps discover your baby's sleeping cycle - Tips to help your baby sleep great - Safety tips from the US Consumer Product Safety Commission - Optimized for all Android smartphones and tablets - Battery Saver Mode for longer battery life - Upgrade to full version to remove ads and enable background audio so you can use other apps White Noise Baby helps your child sleep by blocking distractions while relaxing and reducing stress. Even when your baby is asleep, the brain is constantly scanning and listening for sounds. If it’s too quiet, unwanted noise such as a parent walking into the room or another child playing may interrupt your baby’s sleep. White Noise generates sounds over a wide range of frequencies, masking those noise interruptions, so your infant can not only fall asleep, but also stay asleep. HD Ambient Sounds: - Air Conditioner - Car Ride - Train Ride - Truck Ride - Conch Shell - Doppler Ultrasound - Hair Dryer - Fan - Vacuum Cleaner - Blue Noise - Gray Noise - Pink Noise - Red Noise (aka Brown Noise) - Violet Noise - White Noise - Dripping Water - Water Rumble - Grandfather Clock - Heartbeat - Wind Chimes HD Classical Music Tracks: - Beethoven Fur Elise - Brahms Lullaby - Chopin Nocturne No 9 - Liszt Consolation No 6 - Tchaikovsky Sugarplum Fairy - Chopin Impromptu - Chopin Prelude Op 28 - Chopin Walzer - Mozart Sonata Facile - Mozart Sonate Op KV331 Baby Mode, if enabled, will prevent your device from being interrupted. This helps to make sure your little one gets to sleep faster but also stays asleep. White Noise sounds similar to static of an analog TV or radio station that has stopped broadcasting. The name is derived from white light, which is what the human eye sees when all the colors that make up the visible light spectrum are combined. Blend a red, green, and blue light together and you'll get white light. You probably have noticed if you're in a brightly lit room filled with white light, it is difficult to see colored lights. That's because those individual colors get masked by surrounding white light. In the same way, white noise has equal energy at all sound frequencies to which humans are sensitive. Other sounds will get masked by white noise so they become less detectable. To learn more about White Noise and other White Noise sounds please visit our blog at: http://www.tmsoft.com/white-noise-player/ Safety tips provided by the US Consumer Product Safety Commission and includes important hazard information for cribs, toys, bathing aids, baby gates, high chairs, playpens, rattles, squeeze toys, teethers, toy chests, walkers, and others. CONTACT US We want to hear your feedback! Please send us your suggestions and other feedback e-mail us directly inside the app inside of settings. Positive reviews and ratings keep the free updates coming! Like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/tmsoft Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/tmsoft Visit our Website at http://www.tmsoft.com/white-noise-baby/

description: Jigsaw Puzzle: Cute Animals is a free game with a simple concept, but it will keep you entertained for hours and hours. Features: - 25 HD pictures of cutest animals (dogs, cats, birds...) - 3 difficulty levels - No time limit, no stress - Uplifting music in the background - Set the completed images as a wallpaper or a background - Excellent for brain training You can choose between 25 HD images of cutest animals imaginable and start playing the jigsaw game in just seconds. The user interface is very intuitive and easy to use so that even young kids can play it effortlessly. However, this does not mean, that grown-ups can't have just as much fun playing it. Jigsaw Puzzle: Cute Animals is not only a classic fun game, but also a great way to exercise and train your brain . Logic and planning is required for solving each and every puzzle. There are 3 difficulty levels (3x3, 4x4, and 5x5 board size) to choose from – we recommend that you start with the easiest and slowly progress to hardest. There is no time limit, no stress, just you and the puzzle. The game will start with a nice uplifting music in the background, but you can turn it off anytime, if you wish to concentrate yourself better. When you successfully finish a level, you'll be rewarded with the completed picture, which you can set as a HD background or wallpaper on your smartphone or tablet. The game is optimized for 800x1280 and 1080x1920 screen resolutions, but it should work well on almost any device.
