description: Even as a Tolkien fanatic, it is often tough to remember all the names and places when reading his extensive works. Here is your glossary of all things Tolkien, with over 5000 entries! The perfect companion to The Lord of the Rings, The Hobbit, or The Silmarillion. This application is also a useful aid when watching the movies! In 'The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey', there are many references to things that die-hard Tolkien fans will understand, yet the casual movie-goer will not. The dwarves mention Ered Luin, Dain, and Durin. Radagast calls the spiders a "spawn of Ungoliant". Gandalf warns Radagast of the "Gundabad wargs", yet Radagast is unafraid with his "Rhosgobel rabbits". Galadriel speaks of the Witch-King of Angmar, and Rhudaur. What is the "Desolation of Smaug" or "The Battle of the Five Armies"? How do all of these new characters, such as Thranduil, Beorn and Bard, fit in with the Middle Earth we have seen so far? These references, among others, can now be easily and conveniently understood. Features include an intuitive categorization, search capabilities, and links for more information. This is my first app, built purely for my own enjoyment. Even after multiple readings of The Silmarillion or Unfinished Tales, I still found it hard to remember the massive amount of information, and didn't like going online to find it, so I started designing this app. Now I have decided to share it with everyone! Please rate, and feel free to send me constructive criticism. I am planning to continue updating the appearance, layout, and entry information.
release_text: 1.0.2: *Info button 1.0.0: *The whole thing is new!

description: This is essentially a beta right now. If you try this and it does not work, I would appreciate if you could contact me with the type of phone and app settings you were using. Rhombus uses the Squareup magnetic stripe card reading dongle to read any standard format magnetic stripe card. You can use it to see what information is on your credit cards, loyalty cards, driver's license, and more. When a credit/debit card is scanned, it attempts to determine the issuer. In the screenshot above, you can see a redacted result of scanning an expired visa card. One of the other screenshots shows a scan of a Main Event fun card. Rhombus reads track 2 by default, but will read track 1 if the card is offset by a small shim. Rhombus does not have internet permissions, so it cannot send out any information about cards you may scan.

description: 各位親久等啦，滑音達人第三波華麗麗的來了，中國風，初音，周傑倫，日韓，有你們喜歡的嗎？ 如果覺得滑音達人不錯，請給我們評論和留言，我們都會認真看并答覆你喔，讓我們一起做的更好。 本期歌單： Blackbird-------Sean Murray CryCry----------T-ara 花あそび---------Anan Ryoko 向日葵----------巡音ルカ just do it------Spyair 妳好嗎----------周傑倫 Treasure--------Bruno Mars 朝日に照らされて--雪月 ぽっぴっぽ--------初音ミク 煙花易冷--------周傑倫 screen wiz you--阿保剛 word up---------korn 新たなる日々-----増田俊郎 《滑音達人-第三波》來啦！全新的十三支好聽的歌曲，全新的主題和精靈的節拍元素，讓你High翻天，重要的是《滑音達人》系列完全免費玩哦，而且永久免費，是不是很夠誠意？ 本遊戲延續《滑音達人》的經典玩法，快來下載喔。 也許你玩過勁樂團、TAPTAP、吉他英雄之類的經典音樂遊戲，那麼再來玩滑音達人，你會體驗到更多的樂趣。本遊戲主打的核心點是“節拍準確度100%”“觸摸到音樂的靈魂”“唯美動聽的樂曲”。這些你都可以在遊戲里體驗到。 如果您喜歡這個遊戲，我們誠邀您給出打分，以及留下建議和意見，您留下的文字我們都會認真閱讀，在後續的版本更新或新版發佈中為大家提供更好的遊戲感受，您的好评就是我们最大的动力。 由於遊戲包內容偏大，我們強烈建議您使用Wifi，下載成功后移动到您的SD卡:XD 用戶的好評如潮，節選： ★★★★★ 应用版本 1.0 LG Optimus L7 (u0) 伊宮愛理在 2013-10-13的 下午2:16 进行了评价 場景好美 音樂也都很合口味也比其他音樂遊戲流暢⇨超好評╭（′▽‵）╭（′▽‵）╭（′▽‵）╯希望可以把慘劇の記憶也收錄進去~ ★★★★★ Galaxy Tab 2 10.1 (espresso10rf) Feodott lord在 2013-6-19的 下午4:01 进行了评价 很别致预计新版本。终于等到。更困难，更好玩=），虽然轨道是没有这么多，但主题的多样性和质量的游戏没有放了我的第二个小时:)谢谢作者！ ★★★★★ Nexus 4 (mako) Grook M在 2013-6-19的 下午3:13 进行了评价 很棒，前作和这一款都五星 ★★★★★ Nexus 7 (tilapia) Roy Kuan在 2013-6-19的 上午9:53 进行了评价 太好玩了! 我很喜欢你们设计的游戏方式和音乐风格! ★★★★★ 应用版本 1.1 TCL S900 (S900) 望月舞在 2013-6-19的 上午9:48 进行了评价 很棒，希望能多加一些歌 ★★★★★ Galaxy S II (GT-I9100) 柳湘芸在 2013-6-19的 上午9:34 进行了评价 Good！ ！这是我玩过最好玩的手机游戏了！其他的游戏都枯燥无味！这款游戏却一次又一次都让我想玩它！这是一款好游戏！ ！希望能继续出^^ ★★★★★ nuclear-evb lau saborio在 2013-6-19的 上午9:18 进行了评价 ★★★★★ 許庭瑄 - 2013年6月16日 - Samsung Galaxy S2，1.3 版 整體很不錯 很好玩，節奏都有對上，希望可以再多點音樂，還有簡單困難等分級的分數和紀錄可以分開算，如果能和朋友比賽應該會更有競爭動力。 ★★★★★ 林佑丞 - 2013年6月14日 - 1.3 版 接近完美 遊戲質量給予全新不同的感受！我還特地上來評分呢!猶如音符圍繞周圍起伏，務必增設新歌，謝謝 ★★★★★ 大蜜蜂 - 2013年6月17日 - 1.3 版 讚 最後那一首 空之境界 超好聽 但太簡單了 希望出最難的模式 要不然我都全部按到了 誠心希望呀 這遊戲太讚了 You parents waiting anymore gorgeous portamento Daren third wave came, Chinese style, Hatsune, Jay Chou, Japan and South Korea, have you like it? description: Smartphone Link creates a seamless navigation experience between a compatible Garmin personal navigator and an Android smartphone. It allows the devices to share information, such as saved and recently found locations, where you parked, and your current destination. It also links your compatible nüvi to Garmin Live Services, such as traffic, and weather using your smartphone's current mobile data plan.* Smartphone Link works with select Bluetooth®-enabled 2012 through 2015 Garmin devices, including the • nüvi 2417, 2467, 2475, 2495, 2497, 2498, 2517, 2559, 2567, 2577, 2589, 2595, 2597, 2598, 2599, 2689, 2699, 2789, 2797, 2798 with Backup Camera, 3490, 3590, 3597, 3598 • nüviCam • RV 660, 760 • zūmo 590 • dēzl 570, 760, 770 • dēzlCam Some of these models require a software update, available at www.garmin.com/myDashboard. What Are Garmin Live Services? Garmin Live Services provide the most up-to-date “live” information to your Garmin navigator using your existing mobile data plan. There’s no need for an additional data connection. Some services are included free when you connect to Smartphone Link. Others are available through subscriptions that offer premium content and enhanced features. Examples of Garmin Live Services: •Local weather information: Current localized weather, temperature and forecasts. • Live Traffic*: Garmin Live Traffic provides the best-in-class real-time information to help you navigate in and around congestion. Live Traffic is updated every minute and receives more than 1,000 messages every update cycle. • photoLive traffic cameras*: Provides drivers the ability to look up real-time photos from traffic cameras to get a glance at traffic and weather conditions. • Advanced Weather*: In addition to what the free weather service provides, Advanced Weather also allows users to receive severe weather alerts and view animated radar images on the nüvi. Colors distinguish types of precipitation, such as rain, snow and ice, to help you avoid bad driving conditions. • Real-time safety cameras**: Alerts you to fixed and mobile safety camera data to help you arrive safely at your destination. • Dynamic parking: Helps you locate parking areas close to your destination. It also will provide you with the number of spots available and the current cost of the parking spot. *Contact your mobile service provider for more information about your service plan's data and roaming rates. **Not available in all areas. Subscription required.
release_text: Billing updates to fix in-app purchasing.

description: Avec ExoNathan, ça donne tout simplement envie de s'entraîner ! Une application pour réviser efficacement et de façon ludique partout et à tout moment ! Complète et facile d’utilisation, elle offre un large choix d’exercices interactifs, qui permettent de revoir tout le programme de Français en CM1. Cette application universelle conçue pour smartphone et tablette peut être téléchargée en 3G ou wifi. Une application offrant de nombreuses fonctionnalités : • 1 000 exercices permettant à l’enfant de varier son entraînement avec différents types d’exercices : cases à cocher, étiquettes à déplacer, texte à sélectionner ou à saisir, tableaux à compléter, etc. • Chaque exercice possède un corrigé. • Des exercices de difficulté croissante allant de 1 étoile à 3 étoiles. • Deux modes de révision au choix : - « Je m’entraîne » : 10 exercices variés sont proposés de manière aléatoire en fonction du thème de révision choisi. - « Tests » : Ce mode permet de se tester en un temps limité pour valider ses connaissances. • Un espace de jeu intégré avec le mode « Défis », qui permet à l’enfant de lancer des défis à ses amis (2 à 4 joueurs possibles). • Un suivi personnalisé des résultats : - Chaque série d’exercices est notée sur 10. - Un tableau de scores permet de suivre la progression de l’enfant. • Des ressources complémentaires : - Des cours complets pour rappeler l’essentiel. - Des indices pour aider l’enfant à répondre. - Des documents sous forme d’images et de sons. • Une ardoise effaçable pour s’exercer avant de répondre - Également disponibles dans la même collection, les applications Français CE2, CM2, 6e, 5e, 4e, 3e, With ExoNathan, it gives just want to train! An application to revise effectively and fun everywhere and anytime! Comprehensive and easy to use, it offers a wide range of interactive exercises that allow to review the entire French program in CM1. This universal application designed for smartphone and tablet can be downloaded over 3G or wifi. An application with many features: • 1000 exercises for the child to change his workout with different exercises: boxes, labels to move text to select or enter, complete tables, etc.. • Each exercise has a fixed. • exercises of increasing difficulty from 1 to 3 stars. • Two modes of revision to choose from: - "I train": 10 different exercises are offered randomly according to the theme selected for review. - "Tests": This mode allows you to test a limited time to validate their knowledge. • A play area with integrated mode "Challenges" that allows the child to challenge his friends (2-4 players possible). • A personalized results: - Each set of exercises is marked out of 10. - A scoreboard can follow the progress of the child. • Additional resources: - Courses for complete recall the gist. - Clues to help the child to respond. - Documents as images and sounds. • An erasable slate to practice before answering - Also available in the same collection, the French CE2 applications, CM2, 6th, 5th, 4th, 3rd,

description: TNT Italia, l’applicazione gratuita di TNT che ti consente di gestire in qualsiasi momento le tue spedizioni, si rinnova completamente. La versione 2.0, è da oggi disponibile anche per tablet. Oltre al miglioramento delle performance, ad un nuovo design e a un sistema di navigazione ancora più semplice e intuitivo, TNT Italia offre importanti novità. Vediamole in dettaglio. CERCA SPEDIZIONI Utilizza il numero di lettera di vettura, il riferimento mittente oppure scansiona il barcode presente sul documento di trasporto prima di affidarci la spedizione: in pochi secondi saprai dove si trova la tua merce, ovunque sia destinata, in Italia o all’estero. Potrai inoltre decidere di ricevere notifiche sulle spedizioni che ritieni più importanti. Ogni volta che si verifica una variazione nello stato di avanzamento della spedizione TNT Italia ti terrà aggiornato. Una mappa interattiva ti mostrerà dove si trova la tua merce. Ricorda infine che puoi condividere le informazioni del tracking con chi lo ritieni opportuno. TEMPI DI CONSEGNA Inserisci la località di partenza e quella di arrivo della tua spedizione. Saprai in anticipo in quanto tempo consegneremo la tue spedizioni nazionali dal momento in cui le avrai affidate al nostro corriere. Questa applicazione ti consente inoltre di conoscere i servizi disponibili per ogni località di arrivo: 10:00 e 12:00 Express per consegne garantite nell'orario indicato dal servizio. Express ed Economy Express per consegne in orario lavorativo. DOVE SIAMO Basta il sistema GPS del tuo smartphone o tablet per individuare la Filiale o il TNT Point più vicino, il percorso per raggiungerci, le informazioni sul traffico, i mezzi pubblici e le tempistiche del tragitto. Oppure scegli una località in tutta Italia: ti mostreremo le nostre strutture più vicine. Potrai così scegliere dove far arrivare le tue spedizioni in Fermo Deposito. SERVICE ALERT Per essere sempre informati e aggiornati sulle disponibilità dei servizi TNT in caso di eventi, manifestazioni, scioperi o calamità naturali. LASCIATI AVVISI Se tornando a casa trovi una cartolina “Lasciato avviso” o ricevi un sms che ti comunica che non siamo riusciti a consegnare una spedizione perché il destinatario non era presente al nostro passaggio, puoi utilizzare questa funzione per: richiedere una consegna allo stesso indirizzo, oppure informarci che ritirerai personalmente la spedizione presso una Filiale o un TNT Point. PRENOTA RITIRO Se vuoi richiedere il ritiro a domicilio di una spedizione destinata in Italia o all'estero (sono escluse le spedizioni in import) utilizza la nostra applicazione. Puoi prenotare il ritiro in giornata o per un giorno successivo non superiore al mese. SVINCOLO GIACENZE Quando una spedizione viene messa in giacenza ricevi una comunicazione via e-mail da parte di TNT che ti propone diverse modalità di riconsegna. Tramite la nostra App, in pochi secondi, potrai indicarci quale soluzione preferisci: consegna allo stesso indirizzo, consegna a un nuovo indirizzo, riconsegna al mittente, distruzione merce. TNT Italia utilizza le seguenti librerie open source: - Android Sliding Up Panel https://github.com/umano/AndroidSlidingUpPanel - Android SQLiteAssetHelper https://github.com/jgilfelt/android-sqlite-asset-helper - Sugar ORM http://satyan.github.io/sugar/ - ZXING https://github.com/embarkmobile/zxing-android-minimal - NineOldAndroids https://github.com/JakeWharton/NineOldAndroids - Pull to refresh https://github.com/chrisbanes/Android-PullToRefresh - Crouton https://github.com/keyboardsurfer/Crouton - ShowcaseView https://github.com/amlcurran/Showcaseview - GoogleDateTimePickers https://github.com/flavienlaurent/datetimepicker - libphonenumber https://code.google.com/p/libphonenumber/ - SwitchCompatLibrary https://github.com/ankri/SwitchCompatLibrary - android-segmented-control https://github.com/hoang8f/android-segmented-control TNT Italy, the free application of TNT that will let you manage your shipments at any time, is completely renewed. Version 2.0, is now available for tablet. In addition to improved performance, a new design and a navigation system even easier and more intuitive, TNT Italy offers important new features. Let's see them in detail. SEARCH SHIPMENTS Use the number of the consignment, the reference sender or scans the barcode on the transport document before you entrust dispatch: within seconds you will know where your goods, wherever it is destined, in Italy or abroad. You can also choose to receive notifications on shipments you deem important. Whenever there is a change in the state of progress of the shipment TNT Italy will keep you updated. An interactive map will show you where your goods. Lastly you can share information tracking with whom you feel like. DELIVERY TIME Enter the location of departure and arrival of your shipment. You will know in advance how long it will deliver your domestic shipments from the moment the'll entrusted to our courier. This application also lets you know about the services available for each location Arrival: 10:00 and 12:00 Express guaranteed delivery time specified by the service. Express and Economy Express for deliveries during business hours. WHERE ARE WE Just the GPS system of your smartphone or tablet to locate the branch or the nearest TNT Point, the route to reach, traffic information, public transport and the timing of the journey. Or choose a location in Italy: we will show you our facilities closer. So you can choose where to get your shipments in Fermo deposit. SERVICE ALERT To stay informed and updated on the availability of services in case of TNT events, demonstrations, strikes or natural disasters. LET NOTICES If you are driving home a postcard "Left warning" or receive a text message that tells you that we were unable to deliver a shipment because the recipient was not present at our passage, you can use this feature to: request a delivery to the same address, or personally inform us that you will withdraw the shipment at a branch or a TNT Point. BOOK WITHDRAWAL If you want to request a home collection of an expedition in Italy or abroad (excluding import shipments) using our application. You can book the withdrawal in a day or next day not more than a month. RELEASE STOCKS When a shipment is put in storage receive a notification via e-mail by TNT which offers you different modes of delivery. Through our App, within seconds, you can tell which solution you prefer: delivery to the same address, delivery to a new address, return to sender, destruction of goods. TNT Italy uses the following open source libraries:  - Android Sliding Up Panel https://github.com/umano/AndroidSlidingUpPanel  - Android SQLiteAssetHelper https://github.com/jgilfelt/android-sqlite-asset-helper  - Sugar ORM http://satyan.github.io/sugar/  - ZXING https://github.com/embarkmobile/zxing-android-minimal  - NineOldAndroids https://github.com/JakeWharton/NineOldAndroids  - Pull to refresh https://github.com/chrisbanes/Android-PullToRefresh  - Crouton https://github.com/keyboardsurfer/Crouton  - ShowcaseView https://github.com/amlcurran/Showcaseview  - GoogleDateTimePickers https://github.com/flavienlaurent/datetimepicker  - Libphonenumber https://code.google.com/p/libphonenumber/  - SwitchCompatLibrary https://github.com/ankri/SwitchCompatLibrary  - Android-segmented-control https://github.com/hoang8f/android-segmented-control

description: You can now view all tours from the coming two months in a handy view on your smartphone. Fill in your home address, and you will see the tours you want to ride on top. In a few clicks you can send the tour to your agenda, or to Facebook or WhatsApp. In case you need more information about a tour, you are just one click away from our forum, to get in contact with your fellow bikers. Mountainbike.be is THE site for mountain biking in Belgium and The Netherlands. Our tour-calendar is under constant review to be the most reliable and complete of Belgium and Holland.
release_text: This is now the official app supported by Mountainbike.be. This means: * a free app, supported by the best mountainbike site from Belgium and The Netherlands * tourdata is very complete and of the best quality * continued support for new features.

description: With mobile application ČP INVEST you will have current information about your investments at hand right on your smartphone. This free service will allow you to simply monitor the various aspects related to your mutual funds. - Set up your own profile and have at hand the information only for certain selected funds that interest you - Monitor each selected fund prices and performance of mutual funds, including the development in the chart - Download and view the selected fund's factsheets with monthly summary information - Take a 14-day summary report on current development in capital markets by ČP INVEST’s Chief investment strategist - Set up fund prices notification. This settings let you see the application which displays a message about the fund's prices exceed the pre-set limits (the notification can also be set to daily changes and the whole history of the development can be seen on the chart) - Find basic assistance in the module "FAQ", where you have on hand bank accounts of the mutual funds and the payment information to identify - Direct dial to the info line

description: "Guess what?" is a series of apps which enrich your time. It's a great faun and excellent way to learn! * Now new language version - Russian! * In "Guess what? Flags" app you'll see many countries' flags and letters under them. When you use those letters to form a name of a particular country under each map, you'll get the points. If the riddle is too difficult, you may use the hint hidden under A+. Collect so many points, as you can and then share your score with friends on Facebook! Features: - multiple levels - points awarded for each solved riddle - hints on demand - three language versions: Polish, English and Russian - publishing scores on Facebook

description: This application give the server status, news for the game Final Fantasy XIV : A Realm Reborn and information about your character or friends characters. You can modify in the settings menu to choose your favorite server, your favorite image, the delay of auto-refresh, the news to display... You can consult full detail news, and you can perform a search for character too, add them to favorites for your character and friends character News are available in english, french, german and japanese. description: Build your own scavenger hunt for family, friends or colleagues. You set the challenges and when you play you'll compete by submitting photos and videos, answering questions, scanning QR codes, and interacting with Augmented Reality. You have complete control over your game, it can be private or public and set up in 5 minutes! Of course you can spend as much time as you want to create the perfect adventure. Want a warm-up? No problem get started by trying one of our sample games which will give you a sense of the variety of challenges that you can create. For those ready to dive in, simply "Build Your own Game", invite friends and have a blast on us.

description: Trying to find a rental apartment or house for rent? Designed specifically for the apartment hunter on the go, Trulia Rentals for Android takes the pain out of finding your next home or apartment for rent. Whether you're looking for apartments for rent in New York, Chicago, Boston, or elsewhere in the United States, Trulia-Homes for Rent can help you find the perfect rental home. Never miss a listing with our apartment finder – we identify the newest homes for rent that match your search criteria and notify you as soon as they’re available. FEATURES: • NEW! Design & Interaction: We’ve rebuilt our app optimizing for simple, bold, and intuitive design. • NEW! Collections: Swipe through collections of rentals and discover new properties in a beautiful, intuitive way. • Instant Search: Quickly find properties you like by GPS or location, get rid of the ones you don’t • Boards: The simple way to organize, narrow, and share your favorite homes. • 1-Click Request: Contact landlords and rental property managers on the go with just one click - it's that easy! • Custom Search: Customize your rental search by location, price, number of beds and baths, pet friendliness, and more • Voice Search: Find properties using voice-based search – Just say the city, # of beds and bath, and price range • Draw Your Search: Draw your search area for rental homes on a map! Just circle the area you’re interested in and see rental home and apartment results. • Crime Maps: See a crime map of any neighborhood in the US. • Map Modes: View a map area in normal, satellite or terrain mode. • Open Houses: Find open houses near you and easily add them to your calendar • Local Scoop: See school ratings and nearby amenities like restaurants, grocery stores, gas stations and more. • Instant Updates: Never miss out on another rental – Get push notifications when a new rental property becomes available, or sign up for email alerts right from your phone • Nearby Home Alerts: Get instantly alerted when rentals near your current location hit the market. Let Trulia Homes for Rent help you find your next apartment! Whether you're looking at apartments for rent in large cities ( New York, Chicago, Boston ), or anywhere else in the USA, Trulia Homes for Rent can find the right rental home for you. Have a comment or suggestion? Email us anytime: android_for_rent@trulia.com Note: Trulia is for properties in the USA only at this time.
release_text: • Updated our design for your optimal searching experience • Looking for income restricted housing? We've made it easier to find and request information from these listings

description: MyLifeOrganized is an easy-to-use, yet powerful and intuitive to-do list, task manager and outliner. Designed to strike a balance between the simple and the complex, MyLifeOrganized succeeds where competitors have failed! Using an unlimited task hierarchy and the ability to focus on subsections, MyLifeOrganized allows you to build a task management system to suit your needs. Break down large tasks to achieve a collection of reasonably sized actions that are easy and unambiguous. Organize your tasks into projects and assign contexts. If required, set a due date, priority, and dependency. Once loaded with your information, MyLifeOrganized goes to work and prepares a simple task list containing only those next actions which require your immediate attention. This list is updated automatically once you complete a task, change context or move to another location. Sync wirelessly with the world-class Windows Desktop version of MyLifeOrganized* to add even more power to your task management. You can sync using Wi-Fi or the Cloud service. Using the MLO Cloud service**, you can sync with multiple computers at home and the office and share a single task list or collaborate with other people. Most MLO features are FREE forever and the free version is fully usable, but many users find that the advanced features in the Pro version provide a valuable productivity boost. Please be sure to try out the advanced features during your Pro trial period and consider upgrading to Pro (using in-app purchase) before the trial period expires. Please use our forum for feedback, since we cannot respond on reviews. FEATURES*** ✓Hierarchical to-do list: Organize your tasks into projects and break down large tasks into reasonably sized actions. ✓Next Actions: Automatically display only your next actions in views such as Active by Context or Active by Project. ✓Specially designed for GTD® (Getting Things Done®) ✓MLO Smart To-Do Sorting based on Computed-Score Priority ✓Filtering of actions by context ✓Inbox for rapid task entry ✓Recurring and regenerating tasks ✓Starred tasks: Highlight your important tasks ✓Zoom: Concentrate on a specific branch of tasks ✓Use hierarchy and special option to complete the tasks and subtasks in a specific order ✓Nearby view: Get a list of actions for your current GPS location ✓Location based alerts about Active Actions near you ✓View your NearBy tasks on a map ✓Bookmarks ✓Search ✓Undo for last operations ✓Widgets with voice input ✓Widget will always show your actual todo list depending on the current time or location ✓Custom sorting for todo lists ✓Contexts may include other contexts ✓Use task dependencies (set on desktop) to complete the tasks in a specific order. ✓Use Open/Closed hours for context (set on desktop) to see active task for the current time ✓Add MLO task to calendar and other applications ✓Send tasks from other applications to MLO ✓Collaborate with other people using the MLO Cloud service** ✓Sync with MyLifeOrganized for Windows* using the MLO Cloud sync service ** or via Wi-Fi sync. ✓Templates for various task management systems from GTD® to FranklinCovey and Do-It-Tomorrow are included in MyLifeOrganized for Windows to help you start quickly with your own task management system. *MyLifeOrganized for Windows Desktop task manager sold separately. Professional version 3.5.9 or higher required. **MLO Cloud is a low-cost, fee-based subscription service allowing you to wirelessly sync your tasks between different MyLifeOrganized platforms. Free Wi-Fi sync included to Pro version ***Some features require upgrading to MyLifeOrganized Pro. Your device should support location service and Google Maps for location based task lists, alerts and showing tasks on a map. The version for Amazon appstore does not support showing tasks on a map.
release_text: Version 1.6.14 * Compatibility with recent Cloud updates * Improved stability when sync with Wi-Fi and Cloud * Changes needed for smooth upgrade to MLO v2. soon * Improved stability and performance

description: HIIT Timer is a simple and beautiful timer app specifically made for creating and performing high intensity interval workouts. Features include: - Create, save, and load an unlimited number of HIIT timers - Set timers for your warm up, high intensity intervals, low intensity intervals, and cool down sets - Beautiful timer screen with sounds to follow along with while performing workouts HIIT Workout Benefits: - Time efficient: the typical HIIT workout is 20 minutes or less so use your HIIT Timer during your lunch break - Burns massive amounts of calories: A 10 minute HIIT workout can burn more calories than a 30 minute jog on the treadmill! - Afterburn: A HIIT workout will burn more calories and fat over the next 24 hours than steady state cardio - No equipment needed. Except for your HIIT Timer of course. - Muscle retention: High Intensity Interval Training maintains more muscle mass when compared to normal steady state cardio - Increases your metabolism to aid in fat loss HIIT Timer is the perfect companion for circuit training, your crossfit wod's, and any type of high intensity exercise that you use to lose fat!
release_text: Fixes bug that was causing timer screen to go to sleep

description: This unofficial Cardfight Vanguard Database allows players of the Cardfight Vanguard Trading Card Game (TCG) to access details of all the officially released English cards available, plus English versions of many Japanese cards that have not been released in English. Cardfight Vanguard Database is completely free. We would like to thank those of you who have supported this App. It is because of you that this App remains free. CREDITS Artwork by permission of Tyron91 http://tyron91.deviantart.com/ IMPORTANT NOTICE FOR USERS OF OLDER VERSIONS OF ANDROID Due to changes beyond our control, Version 3.16 will be the last version to support versions of Android below 2.3 (Gingerbread). FEATURES - Simple single screen layout - Powerful easy-to-use filters from the Menu button or the 3-dot screen button - Full size card images (requires Internet access) from clicking thumbnail Pinch zoom and panning supported. - Card text, sets and rarities from selecting item in list NEW FEATURES IN VERSION 3 - Personal Favorites Card Lists Make your own lists of favorite cards Allows you to organize the cards as you like them Build lists with the best cards for each clan, or for cards you want to trade or whatever you like - Build Decks Build your decks on the device Similar to lists, but with a quantity for each card (We will be adding deck stats, test draws etc. in a future release) Existing users please note that filters can no longer be accessed by a 'Press and Hold', as this is now used to display the card options. If your device does not have a menu button, use the 3-dot screen button to access the filters. Regarding the letter 'Я' (if your device can't display this character, it is the reverse 'R') This character can not be typed on a standard Android keyboard. If you want to use this charcater in a search, then type '*R' instead. So a search for '*Reverse' will find all 'Яeverse' JAPANESE SETS We are now including Japanese sets which have not yet been released in English. Japanese sets are shown on the Filters screen as ending with (JP). Please note that we will only include these sets until the English version is released. At that point, the Japanese set will be replaced by the English version. If an English version of a Japanese card has been released in an earlier set, the English version will usually be displayed. ENGLISH VERSIONS OF JAPANESE CARDS Please note that there are no official English translations of Japanese cards until the card is actually released in English. The translations we use are a community effort, and are much appreciated. Translation from Japanese to English give many possible results. This is particularly true of the card name. When the English version is eventually released, we then switch to the official card name. You can see the officially released English sets here http://cf-vanguard.com/en/cardlist/ The release schedule for English cards can be seen here http://cf-vanguard.com/en/products/ Here at stefsquared we value your opinion. If you have any ideas for improving this program, please get in touch.
release_text: Version 3.54 Added English Comic Booster G-CMB01) - Vanguard & Deletor Various Card Corrections See In-App Info for more details

description: WindAlert is a mobile application to locate, monitor, analyze, and share wind data whenever, wherever, and however you want it. With over 50,000 weather stations for real-time observations and our forecast system for observations anywhere in the world we make it easy for you to find the wind data you're after no matter where you are. WindAlert is your complete wind information source. Features: -Report for 50,000 + Weather Stations -Virtual Station Forecasts for Anywhere on Earth -Create Wind Profiles -Wind Alerts via Push Notifications -Meteorologist Forecasts -Model Forecasts -Nautical Charts -Sea Surface Temperatures -Tides -Ability to view and post onsite reports. When you post an onsite report, you can optionally use the WeatherFlow Wind Meter to measure the wind! The wind meter uses the audio jack, and that's why the app needs audio permissions. Learn more about the Wind Meter here: http://www.weatherflow.com/windmeter/
release_text: -Interface Improvements -Performance Improvements -Bug Fixes

description: ## PREVIOUSLY KNOWN AS SLEEPY BABY, NAME CHANGED FOR LEGAL REASONS ## This app turns your Android phone into a baby mobile / noise maker. Choose to play Lullabies, White Noise, or Nature Sounds to sooth your baby to sleep. The app lets select how long you want the music / sounds to play for, and will loops until that time has finished. When you start the music / sounds your phone will start a looping animation which will light up a dark room. Like this app on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Sleepy-Baby/162424940495735

description: “Star Horizon stands on its own as a title that is well worth playing. The visual splendor alone would be more than enough to justify the purchase.” - 148Apps “Star Horizon is a fiery and fitting tribute the likes of Afterburner and Starfox.” - AppSpy “Star Horizon is a slick pulse-raising arcade shooter that evokes many of the best sci-fi space battles in recent cinematic and TV history” - Pocketgamer “Best Mobile Game” nominee @Game Connection Paris 2013 / Selected Projects finals Play as John, a private in the service of the Federation. Focus on amusing story and dynamic battles. Journey through the cosmos, upgrade your ship, make important story decisions and have fun fighting those epic bosses! • Grab your phone and play instantly. Your screen is your controller (virtual sticks? Yuck!) • Rescue your friends or obey the orders – follow the storyline and make choices • Don't get shot - upgrade your ship with in-game currency (no IAP!) and weapons to finish your enemies in multiple astonishing ways • Follow the relationship between the man and the machine spiced up with amusing conversations and absurd humor. • Discover a wild variety of spaceships and fleet • Use your skills to unlock achievements • Support for game controllers John doesn't fight to rack up kills or for honor and pride. At least not anymore. He just fights to survive and get the whole thing over with. His ship is controlled by Ellie, an Artificial Intelligence which is programmed to help pilots stay mentally strong throughout the war and which cannot kill human beings. Federation is about to turn the tide of the war but then things start to go wrong. Ellie puts John into hibernation for 1000 years. Now he will have to discover what really happened and maybe, but just maybe, save the galaxy.
release_text: Bug Fixes

description: “Lets say you own a small business and you are away from your office… and you need to charge your customer’s credit card… There’s an App for That” This Android App makes taking credit card payments Fast, Easy and Secure. PayPodd has a simple entry screen and works seamlessly with the "Big 4" major online gateways; Authorize.Net, PayPal Payflow Pro, Web Payments Pro (US) and Web Payments Pro (UK). If you do not have a gateway yet, compare them here and sign up. http://paypodd.com/merchant-compare.html Customers typically choose Authorize.Net over PayPal for better rates. If you already have one of these gateways you are all set. Just download PayPodd to your Android, iPhone, iPad or iPod and start charging customer credit cards immediately. “This App works perfect for my plumbing service. No more waiting for checks to clear. Transactions are approved in seconds.” -Michael Brady- Plumber This App ensures that when you're at that next trade show, selling door to door, or anywhere without access to your terminal, you will be able to accept credit cards for your business on your iPhone. Never miss another sale again. PayPodd adds new gateways on a continuous basis. “Selling real estate just got easier. I made it easy for clients to make a deposit. My on site home deposits for first time home buyers increased by 30%.” -Sandra Hernandez- Realtor The sweetest part is “PayPodd is 100% FREE” until December 31st 11:59 PM. No Hidden fees! No Readers! No Swipes! No Cables! Data Services may apply. Transform your iPhone into a wireless credit card terminal. Download it FREE! Limited Time Only! PayPodd works fast over WiFi and cell networks (EDGE/3G).

description: Все, наверно, знают игру со словами, в которой из одного слова надо получить другое путём замены на каждом шаге ровно одной буквы. Эта игра называется метаграмма. Целью является последовательным изменением по одной букве, перейти от одного загаданного слова к другому в заданное число шагов. Также эта игра известна под названием цепочка слов. В ней имея начальное слово, например, муха, необходимо осуществить невероятное превращение этого животного в... слона! И всё это меняя по одной букве в слове. При этом новое слово должно действительно существовать. В качестве примера цепочки слов и её решения можно привести рыбную цепочку слов, где из КИТа получается СОМ. Берём слово КИТ заменяем в нём одну букву и получаем КОТ дальше из кота получается КОМ а уже из кома как раз нужный нам СОМ Выглядит просто, но стоит попробовать самому, как вы увидите, что это обманчивая простота. Разработано DeBIA. All probably know the game with the words in which one word is necessary to get another by replacing at each step exactly one letter. This game is called Metagrams. The aim is gradual change one letter, to move from one to another of the hidden word in the specified number of steps. Also, this game is known as the chain of words. In her initial word of having, for example, a fly, you need to implement an incredible transformation in this animal ... elephant! And all this by changing one letter in the word. With this new word should really exist. As an example, strings of words and its solutions can cause fish chain of words, where China gets from COM. Take the word KIT replace it in a letter and get CAT more of a cat turns COM and already from a coma just want us to COM Looks simple, but worth a try yourself, as you will see that this deceptive simplicity. Developed DeBIA.
release_text: null

description: Avec « L'Appli » gratuite du Crédit Agricole Sud Rhône Alpes (départements de l'Isère, de la Drôme, de l'Ardèche et une partie du Rhône), restez en contact avec votre agence à tout moment et où que vous soyez. Connectez-vous avec vos identifiants et retrouvez les fonctionnalités essentielles de votre banque. Cette application mobile s’articule autour de 9 menus : « Mes Comptes » : Consultez vos comptes, vos livrets d’épargne et réalisez vos virements. « Mon Agence » : Restez en contact avec votre agence et nos conseillers sur vos besoins spécifiques. « Numéros Utiles » : Retrouvez tous les numéros d’urgence : déclarez un sinistre, le vol de votre carte bancaire… « Ma Messagerie » : Echangez avec nos conseillers et retrouvez l’ensemble de vos messages dans cette application. « Autour de moi » : Grâce à la fonction de géolocalisation, visualisez l’ensemble de nos services (agences, distributeurs et points verts) les plus proches de vous. « Mes Simulateurs » : Effectuez vos simulations en toute simplicité pour épargner ou financer un projet. « Service Après Vente » : Faites nous part de vos remarques et suggestions. « Mes Envies » : Retrouvez en un clin d’œil les solutions du Crédit Agricole Sud Rhône Alpes qui répondent à vos besoins. « Les Rencontres CA » : Découvrez l’actualité événementielle de votre agence. Vous n’êtes pas client du Crédit Agricole Sud Rhône Alpes ? Vous pouvez cependant télécharger l’application pour rechercher une agence, effectuer une simulation ou découvrir nos solutions. With "The app" Free Credit Agricole Sud Rhône Alpes (departments of Isère, Drôme, Ardèche and part of the Rhône), keep in touch with your agency at any time and anywhere. Sign in with your username and find the essential features of your bank. This mobile app is built around nine menus: "My Accounts": Check your accounts, savings accounts and make your transfers. "My Agency 'Stay in touch with your agency and our consultants about your specific needs. "Useful Numbers": Find all the emergency numbers: declare a disaster, theft of your credit card ... "My Messages": Interact with our advisors and find all of your posts in this application. "Around Me" With geotagging, view all of our services (agencies, distributors and green dots) nearest you. "My Simulators" Do your simulations with ease to save or finance a project. "After Sales Service" Tell us your comments and suggestions. "My Wish" Find a wink solutions Crédit Agricole Sud Rhône Alpes to meet your needs. "The CA Love" Discover news event of your agency. You are not a client of Credit Agricole Sud Rhône Alpes? However, you can download the application to search for an agency, a simulation or see our solutions.

description: It’s the time of the season for loving – and this valentine’s, everything goes! Glide on balloons and jump between platforms in order to reach your loved one as fast as you can. Bouncy Bill is back in this cute & addicting game, and this time, featuring the one and only - Bouncy Betty! You can play Betty or Bill, as you like! And enjoy the new world designed in the spirit of valentine’s. A quick reminder of Bouncy Bill’s Story: Bouncy Bill is a lovable but unlucky turtle that has been cursed by the evil wizard, Zorik, and lost his ability to move left and right. He can only jump upright! Now he is in a race against time to remove the evil spell. Bouncy Bill needs your help to jump vertically onto the moving platforms in the sky and reach his destination as quickly as possible where he might win back his abilities to move around in any direction he wants! There are some tricky moves involved here and you need to land carefully on each platform or else Bouncy Bill might have to bounce forever! Highlights: - 12 new festive levels that will get you in the spirit! - 24 Xmas levels for those of you that are in a nostalgic mood - Character selection – you get to choose whether you play Bill or Betty, and also – who will be your Valentine! - Amazing new graphics - Exciting new content - you will have to play to find out what kind...
release_text: - Some crash bug fixed - Adding high resolution support for tablets - Substantial Performance Optimization

description: Army’s keystone manual for military intelligence (MI) doctrine. It describes in detail these areas: INTELLIGENCE AND THE OPERATIONAL ENVIRONMENT; INTELLIGENCE AND UNIFIED ACTION; FUNDAMENTALS IN FULL SPECTRUM OPERATIONS; INTELLIGENCE PROCESS IN FULL SPECTRUM OPERATIONS; MILITARY INTELLIGENCE DISCIPLINES; ALL-SOURCE INTELLIGENCE: HUMAN INTELLIGENCE; IMAGERY INTELLIGENCE; SIGNALS INTELLIGENCE; MEASUREMENT AND SIGNATURES INTELLIGENCE; TECHNICAL INTELLIGENCE; COUNTERINTELLIGENCE INTELLIGENCE AND INFORMATION OPERATIONS; LINGUIST; SUPPORT The United States Department of Defense (DOD or DoD) is the federal department charged with coordination and supervising all agencies and functions of the government relating directly to national security and the military. The DOD is headquartered at the Pentagon in Arlington, Virginia. The Military Departments at the Pentagon publishes some of the very best manuals, handbooks and guidebooks on a wide range of topics; teaching skills, tactics and techniques. The content of these manuals are unmatched in depth, consider that some this knowledge is drawn from hundreds of years, thousands of man hours, and first hand operational experience. Also material in most of these manuals has been shared with other Military Branches providing even greater depth of subject matter. Military Manuals from the Department of Defense are unedited by outside individuals and or companies, this ensures the information is complete, current, and accurate as the military intended. Listed below you will see some of the major departments or components of the Department of Defense. Here you will find just a few book titles of the many sponsored works from each department. Department of the Air Force: U.S. Air Force Aircrew Survival; Air Force Handbook; USAF Military Working Dog Program; USAF Weapons Handling Manual; Airport Signs and Markings; Unexploded Ordnance Booby-traps UXO Recognition and Reporting Chart. Department of the Army: US Army Survival Manual FM 21-76; Survival Skills U.S. Army / Special Operations, Tactics, Techniques, and Skills Guide; Ranger Handbook; Special Forces Medical Handbook; Military Mountaineering; Boobytraps Army Instruction Manual; Explosives and Demolitions; Guerrilla Warfare; Army Hand to Hand Combat; U.S. Army Special Forces Handbook; Survival Evasion and Recovery; Military First Aid. Department of the Navy: Seabee Combat Handbook; Manual of Naval Preventive Medicine; USN Diving Manual; U.S. Navy Seal Patrol Leaders Handbook; Performance Maintenance During Continuous Flight Operations. United States Marine Corps: USMC 5.56MM, M16A2 Technical Manual; U.S. Marine Corp M40A1 Sniper Rifle 7.62MM; U.S. Marine Guidebook; Close Combat Hand to Hand Fighting Marine Corps; Booby Traps Close Combat Urban; Counterinsurgency; USMC Land Navigation; Scouting and Patrolling; Combat Water Survival; Map Reading; Sniper Counter Sniper.
release_text: null

description: Cliente Itaú já conta com um aplicativo gratuito, exclusivo para Tablets, que permite acessar a sua conta, fazer transferências, recarga de celular, consultar seus investimentos, além de oferecer maior praticidade para pagar contas por leitura de código de barras através da câmera do seu aparelho¹. Baixe agora e tenha toda a conveniência de ter o Itaú no seu tablet. ¹Disponível apenas para aparelhos com suporte a foco automático e gravação de vídeo a 640 x 480 pixels, ou superiores. Conheça mais aplicativos do Itaú: App Itaú tokpag - O jeito mais rápido e fácil de enviar e receber dinheiro. App Itaú Criança - Divirta-se com 4 recursos para deixar seu tablet mais divertido. Itaú - feito para você no mundo digital_;-) Siga-nos no Twitter: twitter.com/itau Siga-nos no Facebook: facebook.com/itau Visite nosso site: itau.com.br Itaú customer already has a free, exclusive app for Tablets, which allows you to access your account, make transfers, mobile airtime, consult their investment in addition to offering greater convenience to pay bills for bar code reading through your camera aparelho¹. Download now and get all the convenience of having Itaú on your tablet. ¹Disponível only for devices supporting autofocus and video recording at 640 x 480 pixels or higher. Learn more Itaú applications: App Itaú tokpag - The fastest and easiest way to send and receive money. App Itaú Child - Have fun with 4 resources to make your tablet more fun. Itaú - done for you in digital_ world ;-) Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/itau Follow us on Facebook: facebook.com/itau Visit our website: itau.com.br
release_text: O app Itaú para Tablet está de cara nova com uma experiência completamente remodelada para a tela do seu dispositivo. Nessa nova versão, você poderá consultar seu saldo e investimentos diretamente na página inicial, além de contar com o pagamento através do leitor de código de barras, transferências e muito mais. Atualize agora e envie seus comentários através da nova funcionalidade “opinião” no menu superior do aplicativo.

description: ***** IMPORTANT: You may want to take a look at our Ultimate NextBus Tracker which serves 40 transit systems including Muni, BART, LA Metro, TTC and so on. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ca.paulshin.tracker_all_lite ***** Tired of waiting for a bus that perhaps would never come? Need a smart assistant that alarms when your bus is expected to arrive at your designated stop in 4 minutes? Use several public transits on your frequent trips? All features you really need are in one place, right here! With our TTC Bus Tracker, your buses are in your hand! The screenshots will tell you everything described below. FEATURES: ✓ Transit system can be seamlessly interchangeable. Requires no refresh or reset at all. ✓ Get real-time bus arrival / departure predictions by any route, direction, stop name and stop ID within just 3 touches. ✓ Check all vehicles' current locations on your toute. ✓ Add a stop to your favorites without any confusion, and even create a shortcut on your Home screen. ✓ Set an alarm so that it reminds you of the current location of the bus. ✓ Check the exact location of the bus on the map. You can also intuitively check other buses and bus stops together at once! ✓ In your favorites, you can not only save a bus stop but also a pair of route and bus stop. Now you can get exactly what you want! ✓ Find nearby stops based on your location. Within just 2 touches, you can find when the bus will arrive at that stop. StreetView will be there to show the surrounding view of that bus stop. ✓ Predictions will automatically updated. You can set the refresh interval on your own. ✓ Full support for devices from Ginger Bread(2.3.3) to Jelly Bean(4.1), including tablets. .... and many more cool features you can easily understand. This app is designed to provide predictions as clearly and simply as possible within a few number of touches. You will love it! Disclaimer: This app has no affiliation with NextBus.com. Pro vs. Lite: - Unlimited number of tracks you can save - Viewing all buses for a particular route on the map - Displaying as many predictions as possible - Auto refresh and Manual refresh - Full featured nearby stop search
release_text: Fixed some errors(unexpected FCs) due to API changes.

description: Baby Snaps is a fun photo snapping game for your child! Baby Snaps puts taking photos of your child into your baby's hands. Let your baby play a simple games and when it touches the screen Baby Snaps will take a fun and unique photograph of your baby. Keep your baby entertained with different games such as a farm, telephone and jungle. Baby snaps really does but your child in charge of your phone's camera. Complete with gallery and social media tools, the world of baby selfies is now fun, easy and accessible. Share your Baby selfies on facebook and see other peoples pictures on the Cat snaps facebook page. This app is must have for all new parents!
release_text: null

description: Ever used Google's Sky Map to identify a star, but wanted to know more than just the star's name? Star Odyssey fills that gap. It includes: * Over 70 of the brightest stars in the night sky * Pronunciation guides (it's not obvious how to pronounce many star names) * Origin of the name (the meaning of a star's name is often insightful) * Brightness and distance from Earth * Interesting astronomical facts * Includes all stars displayed in Google Sky Map * Integration with the SkEye planetarium app for locating stars (Unfortunately Google Sky Map does not support this feature) * Algol Eclipse schedule (find out when to watch the Demon Star fade and re-brighten)
release_text: * Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements * Added Day Theme * Support Manual Location * New Launcher Icon

description: Free Silly Ringtones brings 45 free ringtones and sounds to your Android™ device. Personalize the default ringtone, the ringtone for a specific contact, the notification (email and text) sound and the alarm sound. Press the silly-themed button to preview the loud and clear ringtone or sound. Press and hold (longpress) for features. This easy-to-use application will make you want to personalize your Android phone again and again, depending upon your moods, the seasons, the holidays, etc... Use the icon button at the top of the screen to check out our other ringtone apps to help you personalize your Android device's sounds even more. Best of all, its free! (Banner Ad Supported) Free Silly Ringtones features: * 45 loud and clear, silly ringtones or sounds * 45 silly-themed animated buttons * Press and hold to set default ringtone, the ringtone to a specific contact, the notification sound, or the alarm sound * Icon button to access the other JRJ Unlimited ringtone applications to personalize your phone even more * Free Any and all permissions are either for application performance or advertiser performance. Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

description: This application represents a quick and practical form of teaching your child the basics of communication. The communication is the most important element for increasing the independence and progress of your child. This application uses the basic needs of your child in order to improve his communication skills. How it works: The children must push in the action button first (Ej: I want) and then push in one of the possible options (Ej. food) Remember that the persistence is you’re best allied. You must encorage your son to use this tool whenever he needs to communicate. The practice will make the rest. If you are following a diet free of gluten nd casein, then the bread and other elements, present in the application, are versions free of gluten and casein such as rice bread. The DiegoSaysPro version has many other communicative elements.

Game features include - - Many colorful images of dinosaurs - 8 challenging levels of difficulty This edition of the Kids Dinosaur Memory Game is an ad supported, complete and unrestricted version of the app. This game is suitable for all ages.

description: This widget pack contains next toggles: - AirplaneMode - APN - AutoRotate - AutoSync - Bluetooth - Brightness - GPS (shortcut for honeycomb and up) - LockScreen - Network 2G/3G (shortcut) - ScreenTimeout - SilentMode - WiFi Why APN doesn't work on ICS and Jelly Bean? - Because Google suddenly decided to remove this feature for developers: http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=24227 For HC, ICS, Jelly Bean and up, you need to add widget from AllApps -> Widgets -> Select OnOff Widget from the list For older versions: long click on empty space on your home screen -> Widgets -> Select OnOff Widget from the list ADD WIDGET TO THE HOME SCREEN!!! Also added support for skins. Email us if you have problems.
release_text: - Jelly Bean fixes

description: Easy GPS Navigation Easy solution for make driving easier and safer The new tool which lets us access all important settings during our driving. It has such an easy interface where you'll find easy what to do ★SELECT THE NAVIGATOR: Quick access to Google Maps service. ★PHONE YOUR CONTACTS: Open the dial without having an accident or distractions. ★MUSIC ACCESS: Quickly access to your music. So connect your mobile easily to your car speakers. ★FIND YOUR CAR LAST LOCATION: After each driving, save your location, you'll be saving your current location to easy remember the place where you last parked your car.You can alternate between 3 different searching modes: Google Maps, Radar View and 3D augmented Reality View ★AND MORE OPTIONS: Customize you background interface, your button's colors, language. ★VERY EASY TO USE. This tool is designed for your comfort and it'll try to bring you the best driving experience ★MOST IMPORTANT. We are open to you! We are open to any suggestions or improvements you could think would be better to the app =D! Thank you for downloading this app. Enjoy the app, and rate us to make us improve.
release_text: null

description: Are you preparing for an aptitude test? If you are, then Aptitude Master is here to help you. Sharpen your aptitude skills in the timed mode test, where you are given some amount of time to complete a set of questions. Or if you want it to be more challenging, try out the stress test mode, where you get only 1 minute to solve a question. You can turn negative marking on when you need to get the feel of a real aptitude test. Aptitude Tests are all about getting the answers right as well as managing your time while doing so. Aptitude Master features a 'Minute Minder' , which will help you keep track of each passing minute during a test. You can find it in Aptitude Master's settings page. That's not all... Aptitude Master lets you attend Online tests too. You will get notified when a new online test is available. Your rank will get published based on your performance in the online test. Later you can check your rank from the app itself. ***NEVER RUN OUT OF QUESTIONS*** =============================== AptitudeMaster has a question bank. Your question bank gets updated and new questions gets added each time you attend an online test. So you don't run out of questions. In case you missed out on an online test, no need to worry, you can always update your question bank manually. When you feel you don't want any challenges, just head over to the practice mode, where questions are divided into different sections for your convenience. All of this presented to you in a neat interface. Hope you enjoy using Aptitude Master. Suggestions to improve the app are always welcome. If you do have any suggestions, feel free to drop a mail at pentelabs@gmail.com So what are you waiting for? Start preparing for your aptitude test. All The Best!
release_text: ►App can now be moved to SD card. ►Minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

description: The #1 mobile game of all time blasts off into space! Play over 300 interstellar levels across 10 planets – including our very own Solar System! Whether it’s the icy orbs of Cold Cuts, the volcanic explosiveness of Red Planet, Utopia – a planet made entirely of junk food, or even our own Solar System, each episode offers intergalactic fun at every turn! And the low-gravity environment of space results in spectacular gameplay ranging from slow-motion puzzles to lightspeed destruction. With brand new birds, special abilities, and a whole galaxy to explore, the sky is no longer the limit! ----- “Intergalactic phenomenon worth every penny” – AppCraver “Takes the fundamental physics-based flinging of the original and turns it on its head... It's satisfying, yet completely familiar, and is heaps of pig-smashing fun.” – Gamespot “Anyone burnt out on vanilla bird flinging will enjoy the game's out-of-this-world adventure.” -- IGN ----- - Over 300 interstellar levels! - New playable characters! - Unique special abilities for each bird! - Zero-gravity space adventures! - Trick shots using planets’ gravity! - Hidden bonus levels! - Beautifully detailed backgrounds! - Daily Missions! ----- Join the global phenomenon as it goes galactic! Become a fan of Angry Birds on Facebook: http://facebook.angrybirds.com Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.angrybirds.com Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. Important Message for Parents This game may include: - Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. - Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page. - Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners. - The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
release_text: The New Horizons mission is reaching Pluto! Celebrate this historic occasion with your own space voyage – a brand new episode based on our corner of the universe – The Solar System! - 15 new levels – visit planets, comet, satellites and more - Watch unique videos directly from NASA experts - Learn about the solar system with fascinating trivia tidbits - Harness the power of S.P.A.R.K. – literally a smart bomb, drops knowledge AND destruction! - Keep tapping for Pluto!

description: App Pintar Peribahasa ini dihasilkan oleh Pusat Bahasa Melayu Singapura (MLCS). App ini dibina bagi menggalakkan pembelajaran peribahasa dalam kalangan murid sekolah rendah dengan menuil teknologi komunikasi dan informasi. Diharapkan, pembelajaran peribahasa bagi peringkat sekolah rendah menjadi lebih seronok dan relevan dengan keperluan pembelajaran murid masa kini. MLCS ialah pusat latihan bagi guru-guru bahasa Melayu di Singapura. MLCS menawarkan pelbagai kursus dalam perkhidmatan termasuklah kursus mengenai pengetahuan kandungan kurikulum, pedagogi, penilaian dan teknologi komunikasi dan informasi bagi membangun profesionalisme guru dalam pengajaran dan pembelajaran bahasa Melayu di Singapura. Selain itu, MLCS juga membina bahan-bahan pengajaran yang dapat menyokong keberkesanan pengajaran dan pembelajaran bahasa Melayu di bilik darjah. MLCS turut menjalankan kajian di bilik darjah. App Smart Proverb produced by Malay Language Centre of Singapore (MLCS). This app is built to encourage learning proverbs in primary schools to leverage information and communications technology. Hopefully, learning proverbs for primary schools to be more fun and relevant to the learning needs of today's students.   MLCS is a training center for teachers of Malay language in Singapore. MLCS offers a range of courses and services including courses on curriculum content knowledge, pedagogy, assessment and communication technology and information for teachers' professional development in the teaching and learning of Malay language in Singapore. Moreover, MLCS also build instructional materials to support learning and teaching of the Malay language in the classroom. MLCS conducted research in the classroom.
release_text: - added new avatars. 6 are available now - added animation resources - bug fixes

description: Step-by-step instructions for construction bricks. Perfect for toddlers age 5. Full: Follow the step-by-step instructions to build your creations. This game is specially made for the very youngest. Playing is fun and will add a lot the development of motoric skills. This puzzle game is aimed at 5 year old toddlers. Bring the bricks together and follow the color pattern. The larger pieces allow toddlers to use the blocks with their own small hands. They will lose their imagination with these kinds of three dimensional designs. Let your creativity go and try alternative colors or add small changes. Let the youngest children play and be surprised with the results. Create those elegot figures and get the real and legot figures. These games are intended to play with colorful interlocking plastic building block toys. The blocks can be assembled and connected in many ways to construct such objects as vehicles, animals, buildings and even working robots. Anything constructed can be taken apart again and the pieces can be used to make other objects. Help your child as a parent and you will be surprised how fast the toddler will pick up the game. Take a picture and post the creation online. Happy faces will follow and your family and friend club will enjoy. This kid puzzle needs a set of building blocks like lego or mega bloks. Start with a basic set and have fun exploring this game. The step-by-step instructions are intended to let your kids get more out of these beautiful toys. Most duplo or mega blocks come with limited instructions. These instructions will help you to get the most out of the toys. There are also alternative sets available. If you like to play with building blocks, then this puzzle game is definitely for you! Have fun with these great constructions. Features: - Easy and clean user interface - Free puzzles - Nice graphics - For all ages - Share creations on social media - Starting from the age of 5 years
release_text: Major upgrade.

description: If you wonder to look at images with swapped faces and wish to do this trick on your own taken pics Then go ahead, Face Swap is all you need. Just take picture or choose any from your gallery and play with them. Features : * Automatic face detection * Face Adjustment ( Use the Selection oval to adjust the faces). * Face Scaling ( Just touch any face with one finger and drag another finger anywhere on screen to scale). * Face Rotation ( Select a face and use rotation slider to maintain the rotation of selected face). * Flip faces * Swap faces * Save to SD card * Share on facebook, twitter, google+ etc.
release_text: MAJOR CHANGES MADE 1. Easy Face Cropping Process . Now cropping marker can be rotated ,resize in X and Y direction differently. 2. Save Faces : All face is save in Face Store which can be used while Swapping Faces from Face Store 3. Multiple Swap : You can choose any face from anywhere and can swap multiple faces in other pic 4. Edit Cropped Faces : You can edit cropped faces to adjust with photo accordingly 4. UI is changed Entirely now using Material Design 5. All Bugs Removed

description: Enhancebooth was created for users to enhance anything small and make it BIGGER in any photo! This photo shop/editor app was made mainly for people who love photo booth apps & love taking selfies! All you body builders that need a bit more motivation to go to gym and build those big Biceps, Chest, Legs, Muscles? well Enhancebooth allows you to see the results you have always wanted in seconds, and ladies that love to Pout, want to see what you face would look like with bigger Eyes, Lips or even a bigger Nose?? Well Enhancebooth does it all! This awesome app is also great for kids & great when enhancing a picture of the pet that you love! Try it out, its FREE! HOW TO USE: - Simply take a photo or choose from gallery - Select desired shape/shapes - Scale over the area you would like to enhance in the image - Enhance as big as you like - And then save or share via social media. PLEASE NOTE: All images that are not directly saved by user will be automatically deleted, also image quality will vary depending on the quality of the users handset as well as the quality of the image taken.

description: #No1 Fake Location, GPS App - simplest fake location just one steps! You can send to your friends 'Just teleported to Area 51' Choose your fake location easily, send it to your friends. Check in with Facebook, Foursquare... And of course, the actual location (Real Location) can also be transmitted. Fake Location Map is easy to use, fast and fun. Explore wonderful possibilities and be anywhere you want using the easy-to-use interface. It takes merely seconds to set your new location. - Fake your location with just one steps! - Easy to use and can be done by anyone! - Can be used to play pranks or as an excuse! - Post fake check in! * FEATURE - Set Real Location - Set Fake Location on device - Show Location Address : Street number and name - Search Location * NOTE - This app doesn't support Android 6.0. - This fake location app requires to have google play services, and google maps installed. - It might not work with some apps, but it works with Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, and other apps.
release_text: v2.2: - Support Android 5.x - Update Facebook check-in new API - Extend time of fake location: from 10 min to forever v2.1: - Update Google Maps new policy v1.8: - Change the user-friendly interface and flow more reasonable. - Show the list can check-in with Facebook and Foursquare after selecting fake location. - Add fake location sharing function. - Add function to open applications quickly after selecting fake location.

description: Let yourself be carried away by your own relaxing ambience which can evolve randomly and at your own speed! TaoMix features an intuitive interface, a neat and minimalist design and the unique possibility of creating an ambience which can be different every time. The full version lets you choose between more than 45 high quality sounds and most of them have been recorded or created by myself. Whether you are looking for the perfect ambience for your relaxation and meditation sessions, to practice yoga, enhance your concentration or simply because you love the sound of nature, TaoMix is made for you. Thanks for all your very positive feedback. It’s great to hear from you, and means a lot to me. Download TaoMix now and enjoy relaxing sounds for meditation in a unique way! - deMute - "It almost makes you feel like a God controlling the weather." - AppReview Central "TaoMix is a beautiful app that is well worth checking out if you like yoga, meditation, or just need some chill sounds to lower your stress levels at work." - Tapscape "TaoMix is a new delightful addition to the App Store." - The Smartphone App Review "It's truly made a positive difference in my life & I'm very grateful." A user MAIN FEATURES - Easily create your own unique and relaxing ambience. - Your ambiences can evolve randomly in time, which allows them to be different every time. - Intuitive and easy to use interface. - Neat and minimalist design. - High quality sounds to mix. - Use the timer to fall asleep to your self-evolving ambience. - Save and retrieve your creations: very simple to use before you go to sleep or when you begin your meditation or relaxation session! - Simultaneously use your device while your relaxing ambience plays in the background: you can listen to your own ambience or use another music application at the same time! - More high quality sounds to come in the next updates, so send your suggestions! - Perfect for your relaxation and meditation sessions, yoga practices or even read and write books! Free version of TaoMix: - Get access to a part of the sounds, that allows a great number of combinations. - Mix up to 3 relaxing sounds together. - No time limit! Full version of TaoMix: - Enjoy all sounds, in all categories. - Automatically unlocks all sounds that will be added in the future updates. - Build more complete ambiences: mix up to 10 relaxing sounds together. - Support TaoMix PERMISSIONS EXPLAINED - Read phone state: allows the app to pause sound during phone calls. - Billing : the full version of TaoMix can be purchased from within the application, using Google’s in-app billing system. - Vibration : the device will vibrate when some actions are performed. - Network state : check if the device is connected to the internet. Required to display a warning message when trying to do an action that requires an internet connection but the device is not connected (entering a promo code or purchasing the full version). - Internet access : internet access is needed to check the promo codes validity. - Read and write on external storage : TaoMix lets you save and load your ambiences. These ambiences are stored in a database on your device or SD Card, along with your preferences. QUESTIONS, SUGGESTIONS OR NEED FOR ASSISTANCE? For any question, suggestion, comment, or if in spite of the care with which TaoMix has been developed, you meet any technical problem, please contact me at : contact@demuteapps.com
release_text: v1.1.18 Multiple bugs have been fixed Added a new permission "Read phone state" that allows the app to pause audio during phone calls. Thanks for all your very positive feedback. It’s great to hear from you, and means a lot to me. Please continue to support TaoMix by spreading the word! For any question, suggestion, or if in spite of the care with which TaoMix has been developed, you meet any technical problem, please contact me at contact@demuteapps.com

description: Download the Penn Foster Study Plan App to assist you with planning your exam schedule and keep you on track with your learning progress. The app synchs with your mobile device calendar so that you can see the scheduled exam event along with everything else going on in your life! You can even change the dates if you missed an exam date, need more time to prepare, or if one of the default plans isn’t exactly what you like. Select one of three Study Plan tracks based on how quickly you would like to progress in your program, or set your own completion date with the Customized Plan. Your selection allows you to learn at your own pace and does not affect your academic standing at Penn Foster. The app synchs with your Student Portal to ensure your scheduled dates are updated and consistent on all of your devices.

description: You do not need to stay connected to the Internet all the time. Drugs works in the off-line mode. Drugs guide is a really useful application which helps you not to be completely puzzled by numerous medicines. Every drug has a detailed description, including pharmacologic properties, proposed clinical use, contradictions, side effects, dosage and etc. Moreover, information included in the app might be helpful and understandable both for a medical professional and a person incognizant of Medicine. With Drugs guide you may find out any medicine within a couple of seconds, using index to search by initial letters of the medicine, or classes where you may choose necessary agent and then appropriate drug. For your convenience we added “Favourites” category where you may place any medicine you take now. Mind your health! And remember, before taking any medicine visit a doctor! ***Pay attention: the database of drugs is only in English!***

description: The Explanatory Dictionary of the Living Great Russian Language (Russian: Толко́вый слова́рь живо́го великору́сского языка́), commonly known as Dahl’s Explanatory Dictionary (Russian: Толко́вый слова́рь Да́ля) is one of the major explanatory dictionaries of the Russian language. Contains about 200,000 words and 30,000 proverbs. Collected, edited and published by Vladimir Ivanovich Dahl (Russian: Влади́мир Ива́нович Даль), one of the most prominent Russian language lexicographers and folklore collectors of the 19th century. ((с) wikipedia.org) Dictionary works in offline mode. Database will install on SD-card or in internal memory (if card is not exist).
release_text: Accent added to words. Text color fixed. Paragraph separation improved. Few small bugs were fixed.

description: -------**** Root and a writable /system partition are required! Please, read the description completely! Don't try to use reviews for communication and bugreports - they will be ignored ****------- GLTools is a custom OpenGLES driver (proxy), that is compatible with any known OpenGLES 2.0-compatible GPU + ARM or x86 processor. If you still don't understand, what this app is, the closest known analog is Chainfire3D. Features list: - Change resolution and rendering bitness in any app, even if it doesn't support that by default. - Change GPU name and enjoy enhanced graphics even on a noname low-end GPU. - Take full control over textures: now you can decompress/recompress them (even if your GPU doesn't support that texture format) and resize. Note that decompression feature is available only if you'll install a plugin (internet is required to do that) - Optimize shaders on-the-fly for optimal performance (the same optimizer is used in Unity3D engine by default) - Enable MSAA or CSAA in any app to improve graphics quality (make sure that your GPU supports that) - Measure gained performance with a nice onscreen FPS counter (or you can output FPS information to Logcat if you are a pro) GLTools is 100% safe if you have a custom recovery installed (and you didn't disable backup in GLTools install dialog), if you'll find it non-working, you can just flash uninstall_gltools.zip in recovery and email me with details (or request a refund). Failed on: - Some Samsung devices (random). The lowest success rate is with SGN3 and SGS4 (thx to Knox). Installing a custom kernel can help, this problem is firmware-related. The same for Lenovo devices. - Some games fail to work on devices with Mail GPU even with GLTools enabled. Adreno is supported much better. Legal information: By using this app, you agree to all the following terms: User is responsible to make sure that any plugins he uses are legal to use. All texture plugins (except for Default) are written by independent developers and are placed on a 3rd-party webserver (except for Default which is builtin), which has nothing to do with me, a GLTools author, except for that I provide a simple in-app browser to install them (as all we know, browser creators have nothing to do with any abusive Internet content, the same thing here). User is responsible to make sure that this app won't cause any EULA violation. GLTools is designed for debugging of apps that user is author of, any other usage is not officially supported. Anyway, this app changes system libraries only and doesn't cause any binary modification of 3rd-party apps. All trademark usage is nominative, nominative usage is Fair Use, it doesn't require any permission from trademark holder. Any trademarks are the property of their owners anyway. If you think that GLTools itself is illegal, you can always contact me via n0n3m4dev@gmail.com Source code of used GNU Binutils (assembler, linker, etc) and Busybox can be obtained by writing to n0n3m4dev@gmail.com
release_text: It is not 100% stable, so contact author for any questions! (n0n3m4dev@gmail.com) 1.98: Experimental aarch64 support. Bugfixes. Extremely noobproof, lower possibility of bricks. 1.97: Regression fixes. Added some expert options. 1.96: Using old good stable GLSL optimizer as newer one is unstable. Even more noobproof.
