description: O app do Em Resumo mostra as notícias mais importantes que estão acontecendo agora no mundo , Brasil , entretenimento , esporte , política , economia e em vários outros campos, com foco na velocidade da informação . Dos mesmos produtores do Baixaki, TecMundo e Mega Curioso, o aplicativo é voltado para quem não tem muito tempo livre para se manter atualizado. Nosso objetivo é publicar a informação de maneira rápida e descomplicada , sendo acessível para todos os tipos de leitores . Com o aplicativo do EmResumo , você tem acesso rápido a tudo isto:      • os acontecimentos mais importantes do mundo todo      • resultados e expectativas do Futebol , Fórmula 1 , UFC e outros esportes      • novidades sobre Televisão , Celebridades , Música e Cinema      • fatos mais relevantes do Brasil      • notícias sobre Política e Eleições The app In Summary shows the news more important now taking place in world Brazil Entertainment sport policy economy and several other fields, focusing on the speed of information . From the same producers Baixaki, TecMundo and Mega curious, the application is geared for those who do not have much free time to stay updated. Our goal is to publish the information quickly and uncomplicated way, with available for all types of readers . With the application of EmResumo , you have quick access to all this: & Nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; • the most important events around the world & Nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; • results and expectations Football Formula 1 UFC and other sports & Nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; • news about Television Celebrities Music Cinema & Nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; • most relevant facts of Brazil & Nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; & nbsp; • News about Politics Elections

description: Bandsintown Manager is the touring app that connects artists to fans. We provide a range of tools that allow you to engage with your existing fans and reach new concert-goers. Bandsintown Manager lets artists and managers stay on top of day-to-day tasks for working musicians, resulting in higher turnout and more tickets sold. We display and promote your tour dates on Facebook, Twitter, Google, YouTube, and web platforms like Bandzoogle, Squarespace and WordPress. We also push tour data to our partners like Tumblr, Shazam, Beatport and many more, helping you get discovered. Artists and managers can now access our popular features from your mobile phones and tablets, allowing you to promote your tour right from the palm of your hand. Bandsintown Manager combines the power of our web platform with the flexibility and accessibility of a mobile app, saving music managers valuable time in adding, editing or removing tour dates while on the road. Key features: • Create Facebook events for all upcoming shows and display them on a Tour Dates tab on your Facebook Page for fans to RSVP, comment and share. • Geo-targeted newsfeed posts that reach your Facebook and Twitter fans throughout your entire tour, from presale to opening night. • Key insights and statistics about concert-going fans that are easy to understand. • Artists can directly message fans who have RSVP’d to your show with targeted mobile push notifications. • Browse concert photos and videos of a show posted by fans on Bandsintown and Instagram and repost your favorites ones on Facebook and Twitter to increase engagement. • Receive notifications to approve pending tour dates imported from a third party source. • Manage multiple artists from a single mobile dashboard. *Thank you to our 300,000+ artists for making Bandsintown a must-have app!* Join the Bandsintown artist community: Biz Blog: http://www.artists.bandsintown.com/blog Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/BandsintownArtists Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/BandsintownBiz Instagram: http://instagram.com/bandsintown Terms of Use: http://www.bandsintown.com/terms Privacy Policy: http://www.bandsintown.com/privacy_policy ◦ Bugs / Crash? Feedback? ◦ Email: androidmanager@bandsintown.com

Heart Android L Theme is projected to perfecly merge the icons to the Android Holo interface, all icons are re projected to obtain an uniform aspect for your devices! A special code is set into Heart Android L Theme to give best uniformity ALL ICONS ARE THEMED! By doing so, Heart Android L Theme feeling is grandted even for the less common apps! The whole Heart Android L Theme interface is realized with special graphical techniques used to obtain precision and high definition on high end devices as well as low end devices! we pay great attention to low memory problems, making our apps small! Heart Android L Theme is fully working with all devices, all formats and all sizes! No authorization for the app and no data required! Next update will regard new icons and other launcher support, for example Go Launcher and Launcher Pro If you have any request on icons, feel free to request and we will provvide as soon as possible! -------------------------------------------------------- How to enable Heart Android L Theme theme: - Nova Launcher -> settings Nova Launcher -> look ->icon theme -> Breaking Bad Holo -> back to Nova Launcher -> new icons set - Apex Launcher -> open app drawer -> menu -> settings Apex Launcher -> theme settings -> Breaking Bad Holo -> you can see the preview Apex Launcher -> apply -> back to Apex Launcher -> new icons set - Holo Launcher -> open app drawer -> menu -> settings Holo Launcher ->theme settings-> Icon set -> Breaking Bad Holo -> apply -> back to Holo Launcher

description: VLC Streamer lets you sit anywhere in your house and watch movies or TV shows on your Android. VLC Streamer streams movies from your computer (Mac or PC) over your wifi to your Android. You can watch anything from your movie collection. No need for complex conversion processes. No need to manually transfer movies to your device. Features include ============ * Free helper app gets you streaming quickly and allows you to browse local drives, and Windows network shares * Live streaming of video after a few seconds of processing (assumes a reasonably powered computer) * Support for multiple resolutions and streaming quality levels * Supports Mac OS 10.5 intel and above * Supports Windows, XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 There are a huge number of movie formats, and VLC can convert most of them - but it can't convert everything. If you have any doubts, then please try the free version of this application first. VLC Streamer will not play DRM protected videos. (Videos from the iTunes store do include DRM). VLC Streamer is designed to work on your local wifi network, and the free helper app has to run on your Mac or PC.
release_text: 2.17 -Fixes issue connecting to password-protected helpers. 2.15 -Added movie rename command -Improved network usage - should be a little smoother when you have lots of movies -Fixed some issues with controls showing/hiding correctly -Various cosmetic updates. 2.09 -More fixes -You can now install VLC Streamer to your SD card -Improvements in background downloading 2.00 -Major rebuild of the playback and the UI -This should look better and fix a lot of bugs

description: Aplikasi berisi panduan Instruksi Kerja sesuai dengan ISO 9001 : 2008. Kami dedikasikan bagi dokter, perawat, bidan, mahasiswa prodi kesehatan baik dirumah sakit swasta, RSUD, klinik, rumah bersalin ( RB ), balai pengobatan dan Puskesmas. Fitur Aplikasi: - Penjahitan Luka - Perawatan Luka - Pengangkatan Jahitan - Ekstraksi Kuku - Irigasi Mata - Visum Et Repertum - Pemasangan Kateter - Pemasangan EKG - Melakukan Suction - Pemasangan Implant - Pencabutan Implant - Hecting Perineum - Pemasangan AKDR - Huknah Glycerin - Pemberian Obat Intracutan - Pemberian Obat Intramuscular - Pemberian Obat Intravena - Pemberian Obat Subcutan - Asma Bronkhiale - Penatalaksanaan DM ( Diabetes Milletus ) - Penatalaksanaan Gastritis - Penatalaksanaan Hipertensi ( darah tinggi ) - Penatalaksanaan ISPA ( infeksi saluran pernafasan akut ) - Typhoid Abdominalis - Transfusi Darah - Pemasangan NGT ( Nasogastric tube ) - IK terkait UGD, poli KIA / KB, Fisioterapi, Poli Umum, Radiologi, Rawat Inap, Promosi kesehetan ( promkes ) Salam Sehat Job application guide contains instructions in accordance with ISO 9001: 2008. We are dedicated to doctors, nurses, midwives, medical students study programs both private hospital, hospitals, clinics, maternity homes (RB), clinics and health centers. Application features: - Tailoring Wounds - Wound Care - Appointment of Stitches - Extraction Nails - Irrigation Eyes - Visum Et Repertum - Installation of Catheter - Installation of ECG - Perform Suction - Implants - Implant Removal - Hecting Perineum - IUD insertion - Huknah Glycerin - Dispensing intracutan - Dispensing Intramuscular - Intravenous Drug - Dispensing subcutan - Asthma Bronkhiale - Management of DM (Diabetes Milletus) - Management of Gastritis - Management of Hypertension (high blood pressure) - Management of ARI (acute respiratory infection) - Typhoid Abdominal - Blood Transfusion - Installation of NGT (Nasogastric tube) - IK related ER, poly MCH / FP, Physiotherapy, Public Poli, Radiology, Inpatient, Promotion kesehetan (promkes) Healthy Regards
release_text: Versi 5

description: For over twenty years, the SAS Survival Guide has been the definitive guide to surviving any situation, anywhere in the world. Now, for the first time ever, the million-copy bestselling book and the hugely successful iPhone/iPad app, has been reinvented for the Android. ############# ACCOLADES ############## • Official Honoree Award at the 15th Annual Webbys • Selected for iTunes REWIND 2010 • Apple Featured Application • Featured in iTunes 'Staff Favourites' • Also features in "WHAT'S HOT" and "NEW & NOTEWORTHY" in most countries • Has been ranked the #1 LIFESTYLE APP in almost all geographic locations #### ABOUT 'SAS SURVIVAL GUIDE' #### Written by former SAS soldier and instructor, John "Lofty" Wiseman, this application brings you the elite training techniques of Britain’s toughest fighting force in the most accessible version ever. Now you can take the original set of world-class survival skills with you anywhere in the world – from the peaks of Kilimanjaro to the deserts of Kandahar…or to your closest national park. This FULLY SELF CONTAINED app includes : * Full text of the bestselling book optimised for the iPhone and Android (over 400 pages) * 16 videos providing invaluable survival tips from Lofty himself * Photo galleries of Animal Tracks, Knots, Edible, medicinal and poisonous plants, sea creatures and snakes * Morse Code signalling device * 100+ question quiz to test if you've got what it takes to survive * Survival Checklist * Sun Compass * Search tool to scan entire book by subject * Extreme Climate Survival: sections on surviving Polar, Desert, Tropical, and Sea * Comprehensive First Aid section #### ABOUT 'Urban SAS SURVIVAL' #### The ultimate guide to fending for yourself in an urban environment from the team that brought you the million-copy selling SAS Survival Guide. Written by legendary ex-SAS man John ‘Lofty’ Wiseman, the guide comes stuffed full of useful tips for fending for yourself in every urban situation. And many more besides. This interactive edition contains: * The latest training on self-defence and the law * Dealing with fire and hazardous chemicals * Tackling snake bites and other animal dangers * Handling DIY: power tools, welding, machinery and more * Terrorism * Health information * Full search functionality * Urban survival checklist * And more During normal use, this app does not require an active internet connection however some assets, like videos, need to be downloaded and features like social sharing will be disabled without an active internet connection.
release_text: Stability and Update Issues Fixed

description: ROLE PLAYING GAME MEETS PUZZLE BATTLE!! Lead a ragtag bunch of misfits in a campaign against E.V.I.L. (Evil Villains in League). Crush your enemies using an innovative puzzle battle combined with a rich RPG system. Conquer 6 continents with over 150 missions and become the most powerful warlord in the world! "4.5 out of 5.0 star rating. At the end of the day, Puzzle Trooper is too fun for me to tell people to avoid it." (148apps.com) FIGHT ENEMIES WITH AN INNOVATIVE PUZZLE BATTLE SYSTEM! • To start your attack, move the balls in any direction on the puzzle grid to create combos! • The more combos you make, the bigger the attack! • Call in deadly Bomb Strikes to rain down devastation on your enemies! • Take advantage of your enemies’ weaknesses to deal extra damage! OVER 350 WACKY CHARACTERS TO COLLECT! • Collect over 350 unique and wacky characters from 5 different factions! • Meet legendary troopers like Major Bone Jovi, Major Freddy Mercurie and Colonel Heidi Kloom! • Defeat enemy bosses from Special Events missions to get rare characters! GROW YOUR CHARACTERS FROM CHIMP TO CHAMP! • Level Up your characters to make them stronger • Upgrade your troopers into new units by using Upgrade materials! MORE THAN 150 CHALLENGING MISSIONS TO CONQUER! • Mow down the enemies to conquer the various lands of Puzzle Trooper! • Annihilate mission bosses to get fabulous rewards! • Test your mettle and skills against the bosses in Special Events missions! PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS • Invite your friends or make friends in-game and use their Squad Leaders in your missions! ==NOTES== • A network connection is required to play. • Puzzle Trooper is completely free to play, however Diamonds can also be purchased for real money which allows you to recruit new troops and revive your fallen comrades. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings. ==CONNECT WITH US== • Facebook: http://fb.com/PuzzleTrooper • Customer Service: https://www.gumisupport.com/home ****************************** By downloading this game, you agree to the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy. http://gumi.sg/terms.html http://gumi.sg/policy.html ******************************

description: Horse Live Wallpaper is the lovely new wallpaper you simply must have! Several backgrounds depicting these lovely animals in gallop over green grass fields. Installation instructions: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers -Motion of flashes and lights keeps changing with time. - You can choose from several different themes. - HD graphics and open GL. - Optimized Battery Usage. - Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices. -Horse Live Wallpaper fully supports horizontal orientation and looks amazing on tablet devices as well as on phones If you simply adore gorgeous and proud “wild animals”, you must download this stunning app and make your phone or tablet screen as sophisticated and majestic as these beautiful horses are. Take delight in their elegant beauty and dignified posture with all the amazing “Horse Backgrounds”. Whenever you tap on the screen, you will be pleasantly surprised. People who have great appreciation for the beauty of the horses and their mild nature view these gracious animals as noble beings. This stunning application for Android™ is ideal for all the people who adore animals. The remarkable and dignified posture of horses can leave you breathless, while they simply exude class and elegance, with their long manes, slender legs and mild look in their eyes. Discover various horse breeds, tamed and wild, mustang horses, ponies and many more with this extraordinary app. The sight of a beautiful stallion, a mare, or an adorable foal can make your day - these lovely beauties can leave nobody indifferent. If you haven't ever seen a pony, or you wanted to keep it as a pet, it is high time to decorate your screen with such an adorable cutie and gaze at it while it is galloping, or while it is eating grass. Or if you prefer energetic backgrounds, see the wild mustangs while they are galloping, powerful, strong and proud. Just like swift racing horses on the tracks, a mustang is a "wild horse" with amazing stamina and endurance. They can make your phone screen even cooler than ever before and give it a note of mystery as well. “Horse Wallpaper” is the best "live wallpaper" on the market for you if you are one of those people who know how to appreciate the true beauty of a horse. You can find all of these stunning animals and many more if you download this adorable live application. Just imagine all the amazing backgrounds that capture the warmth they have in their eyes and their gracious nature – those stunning sights are priceless. However, you can download "Horse Live Wallpaper" now for free and enjoy the beauty of these wonderful creatures whenever you desire. *Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

description: Digital Alarm Clock is a reliable, stylish and easy to use speaking alarm clock & widget that can be customised to your needs. All features are now free. The alarm clock that wakes you in the morning can have an impact on the rest of your day and we know that most people prefer to be woken with a different alarm on a weekend to that of a working day. Digital Alarm Clock offers you this functionality and much more. Questions? Check out: https://squarenotch.zendesk.com Nearly 1 million people wake up with this alarm clock app every day Digital Alarm Clock FREE Features : ► ALARM OPTIONS – Each alarm can be individually customised • Built in tones or wake to your own music • Fade in alarm • Nap Timer on main display means you can set a quick alarm in just 2 clicks! • Shake to snooze, number of snoozes, custom snooze time • One off alarm, recurring alarm, date alarm ► DISPLAY OPTIONS – Completely customisable • Day & Night mode with individual brightness and volume settings • Built in nightlight softly illuminates the whole screen • Anti Burn moves the clock to look after your display • Optional day, date, seconds, AM/PM indicator, flashing separator • Select your preferred date format • Choose from over 16 million colours & several display fonts • Fits to the size of your screen or pinch to resize ► EXTRA FUNCTIONALITY – We have thought of everything • Speaking Clock. Simply tap to hear the time (requires TTS engine on device) • Silence notifications ensuring a peaceful sleep • Automatically launches when charging or docked for bedside use • Alarm clock automatically closes when the charger is unplugged or undocked • Handy widget allows you to see the time in style on your homescreen and quickly access the alarms screen. Important Task killer applications can interfere with alarm clock applications. If you experience issues with alarms not activating and you use task-killing applications then you must add Digital Alarm Clock to the whitelist. Permissions All permissions required are requested for legitimate use by the application and further information can be found at https://squarenotch.zendesk.com
release_text: Fixed Android Marshmallow incompatibilities Resolved late alarm issue Reduced ads shown during alarm set up U.S. specific date formatting changes Changed support email address

description: Change your smartphone into a powerful QR Code, Barcode, and Data Matrix scanning utility. Import, create, use, and share data in a matter of taps. This intuitive, full-featured and multi-language QR utility will change the way you interact with QR Codes and their smart actions and activities. Get the app PCWorld and Android Magazine awarded 5 out of 5 Stars. QR Droid Private allows you to digitally share just about anything. COST-FREE and AD-FREE. QR Droid Private™ has the same functionality as QR Droid™, except it does not ask for access to READ_CONTACTS and READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS permissions. Because of this, you will need to enter all data manually to generate QR codes from your Contacts and Bookmarks. If you do want this functionality, simply download QR Droid from http://q.qr.ai or direct download http://g.qr.ai . ***** View how to Scan & Create QR Codes & Barcodes: http://qrdroid.com/adhoc/how_scan_create.htm . THE LATEST VERSION’S FEATURES INCLUDE: - A tap on the Menu button acts as a Home button to bring you to the top of the menu tree. - Intuitive, more aesthetically pleasing UI added to My Profile in Zapper Technologies™. - Updated privacy, menu and settings allow you more control over Zapper Technologies. - Sort and group your history to help you quickly access your most-used QR Codes. - Amazon Store location bug fixed to ensure relevant store will appear wherever you are. - Zapper™ Profile – complete your profile once to seamlessly register, login and pay at participating websites using your Zapper profile (powered by QR Droid’s own Zapper Technologies). ALL FEATURES QR Droid Private is true to its roots: a first class scanner. All the features you would expect to have, and more, are right here! - Create a code from a contact or bookmark and let a friend scan it to their device. - Scan retail items, compare prices, read product reviews, and buy with a "zap" of your phone. - Map where you are and where you're going to, share it with friends, colleagues and family. - Benefit from discounts and special offers by scanning barcodes on coupons and vouchers. - Scan a QR Code on a subway wall or from a catalog and have an item delivered directly to your doorstep. - View websites and movie clips while you're out and about. - Scan a QR Code in a magazine and watch a video immediately. - Scan QR Codes from your camera, browser, SD card, or saved image. - Create and share QR Codes in less than a second from maps, contacts, bookmarks, installed apps & more - 'Inbox' and 'Feedback' options. Receive important updates & give feedback directly to QR Droid Private’s support team using the in-app messaging system. - Create XQR Codes for massive ‘Plain Text’ and ‘Contact’ QR Codes. - USSD codes are never opened automatically, preventing remote wipe attacks of your device. - Add QR Droid Widgets free to help you get the most from QR Droid Private. Install a widget on your Android homepage to take you directly into the specific part of the app you use most: create business cards, history, bookmarks and others. Download QR Droid Widgets at http://0.qr.ai or use the pre-installed widgets in the QR Droid Private app. - Zap a QR Code to gain access to private WiFi networks. PERMISSIONS & USABILITY Designed with security as a top priority, the best QR utility on the market offers a simple interface with abundant functionality This functionality for improved usability requires access to certain permissions in your device. SOCIAL - Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/qrdroid . - Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/QrDroid . - Visit http://www.qrdroid.com for more info and our blog. DISCLAIMERS - 'QR Code' is a registered trademark of Denso Wave Incorporated. - QR Codes ARE NOT recommended for use with confidential/secret information. - QR Droid™ uses ZXing library. Apache License 2.0. - Direct download installable QR Droid Private™ APK here: http://h.qr.ai .
release_text: v6.3 - User-to-user messages. After creating a QR code just touch 'Messenger' to allow anyone to contact you after scanning your code with QR Droid. - Option to keep every scan on History, even if it's repeated. Enable it on Settings. - Our new scanning engine has been re-enabled. Select your preferred one on Settings. - Several fixes and improvements.

description: See the day and date at a glance on your home screen with Day Widget! No permissions, tiny memory size, near zero CPU as it only needs to run for a moment at midnight. Clicking the widget opens your standard calendar. ** THE APP ICON IS NOT THE WIDGET! ** All the great comments and ratings are really appreciated. Thanks! This app shows the date as a widget. The launcher icon is not the widget! Install the widget into an empty space on your home screen in the usual way, choosing Day Widget from the Widgets list. Please ensure the application is not installed to "external" or SD card memory, or the widget cannot work. (The second screenshot shows the size and shape options. The third screen shot is a composite to show how the widget looks in different countries - the widget only displays in the language set in your device's settings.)
release_text: v2.03: Changed app icon to reduce confusion! ** THE APP ICON IS NOT THE WIDGET! ** v2.02: fix for ellipsis on long days of the week v2.01: fix for layout issues on some devices v2.00: new smaller size option

description: NJ Trains Free finds the best New Jersey Transit routes from your station to your destination. It handles routes with train changes, and highlights the fastest trips. It can also show the complete schedules for all the train lines of NJ Transit.
release_text: Version 14.0 - Updated with new schedules, good thru Jan, 2016

description: KGO-TV San Francisco. With ABC7 Weather: SF/Bay Area, when threatening weather is nearby your phone can be set to alert you! Weather alerts are read aloud for you so you don’t have to stop to read the screen. It’s the power of a NOAA Weather Radio combined with the accuracy of AccuWeather and ABC7 News for San Francisco and the Bay Area all in one convenient app! There’s no other app like it. With the FOLLOW ME feature you’ll stay safe when you’re on the go. ABC7 Weather: SF/Bay Area can alert you to severe weather wherever you are -- whether you’re on your daily commute in the Bay Area or travelling anywhere across the U.S. ABC7 Weather: SF/Bay Area is fully interactive; Zoom down to get a street level view of live conditions. And of course, get current conditions, hourly and long-term forecasts right at your fingertips. FEATURES: * Follow Me – Activate this feature so that you get weather alerts wherever you are, anywhere in the U.S. No matter where you travel, the app will help keep you safe. * Set a static location – In addition to the Follow Me feature, you can set three (3) additional locations to receive alerts on. So if you’re on the road, you could still get alerts for what’s threatening your home, or where a loved one lives. * Audio alerts – Listen to weather alerts just like a NOAA Weather Radio, so you can be informed and keep moving. * Current Conditions, Hourly Forecasts and 7 Day Forecasts. * Video forecasts and live weather video (when available).

description: This app contains 5 free fonts compatible with the FlipFont program that is installed on most Samsung Galaxy devices. This app is designed to be used with Samsung Galaxy devices that are using the TouchWiz interface and have the FlipFont program. NOTE: This App is NOT sponsored, endorsed, or affiliated with Monotype Imaging, Inc, the owner of the FlipFont trademark and technology. Fonts for Android Samsung Galaxy FlipFont Free have spent the last year gathering free fonts and creating Android apps to provide users with the ability to change their device’s typeface for free. Using the FlipFont font changer program installed on your Samsung Galaxy phone, you can use this application to customise your device to one of the many beautiful fonts that we have collected. Each Bundle of fonts is a random selection of 5 typefaces that have been optimised for use on Samsung Galaxy Android devices. Please browse through our many FlipFont packs to find the perfect font styles that fits your taste. To change fonts on your Samsung Galaxy device, navigate to the display settings in your device's system settings. In the display settings you can change the font style to any of these 5 new fonts for Android. This font pack should work on all Galaxy brand phones and will provide fonts for Samsung Galaxy 3 (S3), fonts for Samsung Galaxy 4 (S4), and fonts for Galaxy Note 3. This app will not work on developer devices, such as the Galaxy Nexus, because it does not have the FlipFont program. Please verify that your phone can change its font. Look for the font style option in the display or screen display section of your device settings. This app is not designed as fonts for root and does not require root permission to change your font, nor will it require you to restart your phone.* Also, you will be able to enjoy your fonts for texting and messaging, however the typeface used on your device will not be sent to people that you send a text message to. We love fonts and love to personalise our Android devices with unique typefaces. We hope you enjoy all of the fonts that we have collected for use on FlipFont free. Please let us know if you have any issues using a font or any suggestions on fonts that you would like to see. * Phone restart will not be required for devices running Android 3.0 or later. Devices such as the Samsung Galaxy Y and Samsung Galaxy Ace will still require a restart to apply the new font. This android application is not affiliated with FlipFont or Monotype Imaging Inc. All functionality, trademarks and copyrights remain the property of their respective owners.

description: "Jumpy Jack'son" – is a super game! And you will become addicted from the first launch! Skater Jumpy Jack'son races on a skateboard on the road and jumps over the walls. Help Jumpy Jack'son to race as far as possible and don’t let him to crash into obstacles. Passing obstacles Jumpy Jack'son gets special awards which make him a cool skater. Among the awards there are sunglasses, sneakers and so on... So start the game and collect all this items! The game has trendy 8-bit style but even not fans of this trend will definitely find the game interesting. Nice accompanying sound will leave a good impression about the game. Controls are simple enough – tap the screen and hold your finger to adjust the height of the jump. Good reaction and concentration are very important here. Both these factors will guarantee your success. Table of records is integrated in the Jumpy Jack'son game so you have the opportunity to compete with your friends or players from around the world. Prove that you are the best!

description: 8fit takes the work out of healthy living. We deliver results through tailored, easy to follow meal plans and workouts created by expert trainers. We teach you how to lose weight with a healthy diet and workout routines. Work out anywhere: at home, in the park, at a hotel or even on a boat. No need for a gym membership or expensive equipment. Use your own bodyweight to build muscle strength, increase endurance, develop and improve cardiovascular fitness and lose weight. The HIIT workout (high intensity interval training) is one of our favorites because it is fast and more effective than traditional cardio workouts. It’s not a diet. It’s not an exercise program. It’s a lifestyle change. 8fit helps you make exercise a part of your daily routine, improves your nutrition and give you the tools you need to reach your health and weight loss goals. The healthy meal plans are based on your personal goals, body composition, activity levels and dietary choices. Updated as you progress so your food choices evolve with you. It is a weight loss diet you can sustain for life, not a fad. 8fit focuses on what you can have, not what you can’t have. We deliver healthy meal plans and snack recipes directly in the app. How it works • Get a personalized fitness and nutrition plan. • Take the 8fit strength test before you start to see which exercise level and workout plans are right for you. • Begin your recommended workout program. • Get daily reminder alerts to your phone or email. • Use the 8fit-shopping list to plan your trip to the grocery store and follow the 8fit meal planner to lose weight fast. What you get Benefits • Live a healthy lifestyle • Weight loss through diets that work, healthy recipes, a meal planner and tailored workout plans • Personal trainer in the palm of your hand • Learn how to lose weight and keep it off • Live longer Meals features (available to Pro users only) • Healthy meal plans based on dietary needs and created by nutritionists • Hundreds of healthy recipes with the correct caloric intake and composition to meet your goal • Personalized diet plans to lose weight • Time-efficient recipes and meal plans • Shopping list to plan your week • Suitable for a low carb diet, paleo diet, weight loss diet and a range of other healthy diet plans Workouts programs • Exercises with a variety of levels to progress through • Introduction to fitness and nutrition • A strength test to measure your progress • Daily motivation, personal trainer tips and activity tracking • Time-efficient workouts (HIIT workout, Tabata, Muscle Building) • Exercises to help you get and stay fit • Easy to follow workouts with instructional videos • Go at your own pace PRO Plan Extras • Delicious & nutritious meals with our healthy recipes and diet plans • Workout plans targeted for body toning • Additional exercises to build muscle We are committed to promoting a healthy diet, providing excellent workout plans and increasing your weight loss. Healthy food can taste delicious! A low carb diet and paleo diet is easy to follow with our plans. Commit to our weight loss diet meal plans and see the results you have been waiting for. 8fit is free for everyone. To unlock exclusive workouts and complete meal plans subscribe to the Pro version.

description: Put some emotion into your SMS and emails for free! Emoji Keyboard is a free app for Android. Emoji Keyboard helps you add several different emotions to your email and text. So go ahead and express yourself. It is free, all you need is your imagination and your Android phone or tablet. When you want to express an emotion simply tap the smiley. You will see a bunch of different emoticons and you can choose the one that expresses your emotion the closest. It is all free for your Android phone. Stick your tongue out, wink, or show you are mad all with a single tap on the keyboard. You can easily switch between alphabets, numbers and emoji simply by swiping the keyboard, so expressing these emotions in your regular email or SMS is extremely easy. Emoji Keyboard for Android is absolutely free. Emoji Keyboard is the best Emoji for Android. Whether you need Emoji for Instagram or Emoji for Facebook or Emoji for SMS, Emoji Keyboard is to your rescue. Use Smileys in style and quickly with Emoji Keyboard. **** Please note *** By default your Android device will not show the actual icons. It will only show different characters. You need a device that supports emoji icons to see the actual icons. If your friends have a supported device then they will be able to see proper icons even if you are not able to see it on your device. Install and setup: After downloading the app first select “Enable Emoji Keyboard” button and make sure to check the box to the right of Emoji Keyboard. Next select “Default Emoji Keyboard” button and select Emoji Keyboard from the list. Now you are done. From here on whenever you need a keyboard (mail, SMS etc.,) Emoji Keyboard will be presented with the option to insert Emoji wherever you like. Enjoy the free Emoji Keyboard for Android app and give us your feedback. Emoji Keyboard is a full fledged keyboard is not a simple Emoji Plugin. You can use Emoji Keyboard as full fledged keyboard without any other app required to be installed. Emoji Keyboard works great as Facebook Emoji Plugin, SMS Emoji Plugin, MMS Emoji Plugin or as Emoji Add on for any other website or app. Emoji Keyboard has best looking Emoji Smileys. If you want put a Emoji Facebook Status this is the right app for you.
release_text: 1. Added Spell Check and Word Suggestions. 2. Reduced App Size for Faster download. 3. Improved Instructions to set up Emoji Keyboard.

description: ¿Necesitas practicar la formulación y nomenclatura inorgánicas? ¿Cuánto sabes de química inorgánica? Este programa es una aplicación que sirve para aprender y practicar formulación y nomenclatura inorgánicas. En él encontrarás 40 ejercicios resueltos que te serán de gran utilidad para practicar. Los ejercicios están ordenados por niveles, desde un nivel básico hasta un nivel más difícil. Así, pues, encontrarás compuestos tales como: óxidos, hidruros, ácidos, hidróxidos y mucho más. Asimismo, se explican de forma detallada las soluciones. Need to practice formulating and inorganic nomenclature? How much do you know about inorganic chemistry? This program is an application that helps students learn and practice formulation and inorganic nomenclature. In it you will find 40 solved exercises that will be of great use to practice. The exercises are sorted by levels, from basic level to a more difficult level. So you will find compounds such as oxides, hydrides, acids, hydroxides and more. It also explains in detail the solutions.
release_text: + Mejora del aspecto visual y controles.

description: This is the companion app to Learning Pure Java Android Programming. With this and the video app you can learn Android programming right over your phone or tablet with this great app. Popular videos by Programmers Institute help you to learn Android programming in pure Java even if you have never programmed before. You get the basics form the ground level to get you started and on your way in a step by step fashion. Set you phone or tablet by your computer and let this app help you through the beginning steps. More apps like this are on the way! This is the first series of Pure Java Android Programming.

description: Pipes 3D is a simple, addictive, fun and challenging puzzle game which will make you think in 3D. It is inspired by numberlink aka flow type games, but instead of playing on a two dimensional plane, you get to play on a surface of a three dimensional cube. This game retains the enjoyment and simplicity of a regular flow-like games, as well as offers more challenging ways to play it for those who find regular numberlink type games just a little bit too easy. * Please, don't leave 1-star ratings without any comment. Your feedback is very valuable to us! FEATURES: * 500 levels and more coming! * Different difficulty levels catering for everybody's taste! * Colorful high level 3D graphics! * Deep, relaxing music! * Comfortable, modifiable controls! * Google Play integration with leaderboards and achievements! * Gameplay statistics! * Excellent quality models and pixel shader lighting! * 3 types of pipe models!
release_text: 1.1.2 Optimizations added Completion percentage shown on level select buttons Completed levels are shown green

description: It’s true that anyone can speak another language.Russian-Turkish phrasebook helps you interact with people who know Turkish language. FREE Version contains more than 200 phrases! description: 24/7 Time Lapse is designed with ultra low power consumption in mind to allow you to make Time-Lapse video over days, weeks and months using your Android phone or tablet. This application is designed to allow you to capture/run at least four times as many photos/long compared to the alternative applications. Our internal test shows that this app was able to capture photos for over 50hrs in a single charge using Sony Xperia Z, Android 4.4 using our application's default settings while both WIFI and GSM radio are active. Our best competitor's application was only able to last at most 6 hr under the same conditions ( http://tinyurl.com/p99ttzy) . With our amazing battery life, it is now possible for you use your everyday phone as your wearable life blogging camera, capturing every moment in your life or even capture information from your weather station. Features - Auto stop capture when battery is low - Capture photos continuously by running in background mode - Customizable storage space & location & orientation - Automatically recycle sdcard space when full, recycling can be disabled via option - Built-in photo browser - Adjustable camera focus mode and LED flash - Adjustable shutter sound & screen brightness - Movable overlay button on top of any application to start/stop photo capture - Can be moved to SDcard after installation - LCD screen will be keep on if you leave this app running in the foreground. The LCD screen will turn off according to your device's settings when in background mode. - Can be configured to start at boot to resume capture if forcibly closed while capturing photos To maximize your battery life when using this app, before you start photo capture, make sure you turn on airplane mode, check both WIFI and GPS are turned off. After photo capture is started, press Home button to put the app into background mode and then turn off the device's LCD screen as well. To assemble the photos into a time-lapse video, you can use Ezvid ( http://www.ezvid.com/ ) or MakeAVI ( http://makeavi.sourceforge.net/ ) or Picasa 3 ( http://picasa.google.com/ ) for Windows Computer; Time Lapse Assembler ( http://www.dayofthenewdan.com/projects/time-lapse-assembler-1 ) for Mac OS X. More details can be found at our FAQ page - http://247timelapse.com/faq Free version limitations: - only capture photos up to 2MP - application will stop after 20mins if charger is connected (this is only to allow you to test the application to make sure it works when charger is connected.) - All exif image information including date taken, camera maker/model, exposure time, flash mode, etc are not recorded in the saved photo. - photos recorded carries imprinted info Device limitations: - Do NOT use another camera app when you are capturing with 247timelapse, otheriwse photo won't be taken - Please upgrade or install version 0.3 if your device is unable to take photo when screen is off. - To keep the screen on, simply leave 247timelapse app running in the foreground. To save power when screen is on, you could configure the screen brightness to minimum inside settings. Known bug - If you turn off the LCD when the app is recording in the foreground. Recording will stop. We appreciate your feedback. Please feel free to send us your feedback or problems you encountered in our support forum - http://247timelapse.idea.informer.com/ If you have problems using this app on your device, you need to help us by posting it on our feedback forum, so that we can respond to you and also allow you to provide follow up information for us to diagnose as well as resolve the problem. Simply posting negative feedback here won't help. If you would like to see us update this application with more and better features ASAP, please support us by purchasing the paid version and also spread the words to all your friends. We are committed to always offer you a free version of this app with more than sufficient features for casual time-lapse photographers, except the professionals.
release_text: Version 0.3.1 - added subfolder option - removed space recycling dialog when screen is off, fixed app stop recording when space limit is reached

description: ❤Sharks Live Wallpaper❤ is awesome background for your mobile. You don’t have to avoid shark attacks, you will see all shark species without diving into a deep ocean! Fantastic images of sharks will amaze all your friends, get these cool backgrounds as soon as possible. This amazing new app offers you wonderful animated backgrounds of dangerous sharks swimming in deep blue water. Download “Sharks Live Wallpaper” and decorate your screen in a best possible way. Beautiful wallpapers and fantastic screen savers are waiting for you! - Amazing 3D live wallpaper for your phone! - Animated shark pictures decorating your screen; - Full support for landscape mode and home - screen switching! - Amazing HD graphics; - Social share button and more - This beautiful, free and enjoyable background is waiting for you! Follow the installation instructions: Home - > Menu - > Wallpapers - > Live Wallpapers - Motion of flashes and lights keeps changing with time. - You can choose from several different background themes. - Optimized Battery Usage - Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices. - The wallpaper app will sleep when your phone is inactive, so this live wallpaper will not drain your battery. - Shark Live Background fully supports horizontal orientation and looks amazing on both mobile phones and tablet devices. Many people believe that sharks only live in the oceans. However, they are distributed in bodies of water found all over the world. Download ❤Sharks Live Wallpaper❤ and get familiar with various types of sharks. Meet the great white sharks, bull sharks, tiger sharks, whale sharks, hammerhead sharks and many more with these awesome “pictures of sharks”. With these “shark pictures” you will have the best wallpapers for your Android™ phone. There is nothing more fun than diving into the deep ocean and meeting face to face with the most unusual shark species. Sharks have very few natural predators which allow them to freely move to new habitats when food is scarce. They are loners for most part of their lives so they don’t travel together. Shark is the largest fish in the ocean, meet scary shark and shark teeth with your favorite “shark wallpaper”. Download ❤Sharks Live Wallpaper❤ and travel under the sea with these wonderful shark photos. The great white shark is one of the most feared sharks in the world. Tiger shark has been recorded with the most attacks on humans only behind the great white. The whale shark is the biggest of all shark species. The bull shark is classified as number three on the list of most dangerous sharks in the world when it comes to attacks on humans. Hammerhead Shark - the shape of their head allows them to be able to find prey easier. Since their eyes are set apart they can see what is going on in various directions better than other species of sharks. You don’t have to be afraid of shark attack and shark bite, get these shark photos and get close to scary sharks without diving with sharks. Use the best “live wallpaper” and favorite shark picture to decorate your screen. Do not miss this fabulous opportunity to beautify your Samsung Galaxy mobile phone with big shark wallpaper for free! Get these HD Wallpapers, inspired by the most dangerous sharks, completely free of charge. Amazing shark images offers you the best 3D wallpaper for your phone screen. These backgrounds are so realistic that most aggressive shark will jump up from your screen and scare all your friends. This is the chance to meet endangered sharks, wait no more, download ❤Sharks Live Wallpaper❤ and enjoy great white shark pictures on your screen. Best wallpapers and free screen savers are a click away from you. *Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. *This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Samsung.

Toujours plus de proximité et d’utilité où que vous soyez : CA POCKET est là pour vous aider dans vos démarches quotidiennes. Un flux d’actualités vous est également proposé afin de rester informé sur les dernières actualités réglementaires, de bénéficier de conseils financiers et de suivre toute l’actualité de nos produits... Toutes ces possibilités sont maintenant à votre disposition grâce à CA POCKET. Télécharger gratuitement CA POCKET c’est l’adopter et surtout avoir sa banque dans …sa poche ! Vous n’êtes pas client du Crédit Agricole ? Vous pouvez quand même télécharger l’application pour découvrir tous nos produits et entrer en contact avec un de nos conseillers. True multi-application, CA Pocket allows you to find a single point of entry, a concentrate of your bank! Enhance accessibility and utility wherever you are: POCKET CA is here to help you in your daily steps. This application focuses on paving enhanced functionality as follows: "My Apps" Find direct access to all national applications Crédit Agricole downloaded or not: My Budget PACIFICA (property insurance), Kwixo (online payment), Twitter Cashback (discounts online) ... so that App to My Jobs CA that allows you to access job opportunities Crédit Agricole Group. Note: conditions for access to these applications are specific to them and independent of those for Pocket CA. "My agency" keep in touch with your agency: calling by phone, be recalled immediately by a counselor, call No Emergency loss cards for example, take an appointment, see our prices etc ... "My services": access to all our online banking services: check your accounts, make transfers or place your trading orders from your smartphone! Make simulations loans and savings, access your geolocated weather ... "My Territory" Discover all deals; mozaic local benefits; the contests ... 4 pads for direct access to your accounts and your preferences, the toolbox (simulator credit and savings, a currency converter, a document scanner, a QR code reader) and part support and information . A news feed is also available to keep informed on the latest regulatory news, receive financial advice and follow all news about our products ... All these possibilities are now available through CA POCKET. Download POCKET CA is to adopt and especially having his bank ... in his pocket! You are not a client of Credit Agricole? description: The classic Memory is an easy,simple but very funny and enjoyable game, with its attractive illustrations of animals, fruits and vegetables, geometric forms, domino counters... It is totally free, and it is traduced to these languages: spanish, german, italian and english. This game involves founding pairs of cards, and it has different levels of difficulty. Finish a level for unblocking the next level. Finish all levels of a world for unblocking the next world. It has three game modes: - Personalized game, wich allows to select the pack of cards and the number of cards wich will be showed (the more cards the more difficulty). - Unblocking levels, as you overcome the previous levels. - 2 players game It has 14 different pack of cards with attractive illustrations: Fruits & Vegetables, Animals, Geometric, Dominoes, The ABC, Valentine's Day, Easter, Sea and beach, Prehistory, Kindergarten, Olympic Games, Clothes & accessories, Halloween, Christmas If you like puzzles and ability games, you will like our Memory, a game for brain training and improve your memory at the same time you are having fun. A game enjoyable for kids and adults. Playing our Memory game your ckids will improve their concentration and visual memory while they are enjoying its funny ilustrations The state of the game will be automatically saved each time you quit a game, so you will be able to continue it whenever you want. It works perfectly on tablets and mobile phone. Includes a new mode of game. Play versus a friend! Whose memory is better? The internet connection is required for advertisements. The connection to internet will be required to obtain anonymous statistic figures about the use of the game. Advertisements can be removed by pressing the red button on the right side of them. If you are a Google+ user and you like the game, please press +1 botton. This will help us to improve the game and to create new ones. Thank you. If something does not work correctly or if you have any suggestions please contact us by e-mail.

description: "Category Quiz" is a quiz where the questions must be answered by category. The "playing field" looks a little bit like Jeopardy! Currently there are over 8,000 questions available! (English and German) Version 2.0 of Category Quiz brings the long awaited integration of Google Play Games which allows you to compete with players all around the world by means of a global highscore list. Another big deal is the possibility to unlock achievements and earn experience points. You need to login with your Google account to enable this new features. If there are any problems, crashes or questions please contact me via email ( categoryquiz@live.at ) or on Facebook! The questions are frequently updated so that you continue to have fun with the quiz! You need to pay special attention to the category "News". Questions from this category contain all possible topics and refer to current events around the globe. This questions will be moved to the corresponding category approximately every 8 weeks and get replaced in the "News" category with completely new questions. At the moment the questions are divided into the following categories: - Sports - Entertainment - Food - Geography - Science - History - Art & Literature - People - Music - Religion - Technology - Animals - Economy - Politics - News If all questions in a category are answered correctly you get 100 extra points. If the second category is completed, you get 200 extra points, for the 3rd Category 300 extra points, etc. If a question is answered incorrectly the category gets "locked" and no more questions can be answered in this category. If the question timer is used (can be enabled/disabled using the game options) the user has 30 seconds to answer the question. The faster the question is answered the more points you get (3 points for every remaining second). In addition the user has the possibility to get help using the 3 Jokers (50:50, stop timer, new question). If you decide to start a "quick game" 6 categories are chosen automatically. In a "normal game" you can choose your favorite 6 categories. ! IMPORTANT! You have the possibility to enable/disable if the correct answer is shown in the case that you answer a question incorrectly in the "options".
release_text: - Google Play Games integration - Design improvements for tablets - Minor changes in overall look and feel

description: Puzzle platformer, 3D side- scroller running games, endless journeys are collected. The best Platform Games are collected for you to run and jump endlessly in adventurous journeys. The best Platform Games in the world are selected meticulously by our editors and gathered in this to make the access to them easy and fast. You see the list of the games where you cannot play directly. With 'install' you will be directed to the android market to install and to play only if you have internet connection. With each passing day, too many games are included into the android market and it makes difficult and even impossible to find the category games. We have created categories consisting of the top quality games in android market. Our editors follow the market for you and include the new released games and the popular ones with their reviews and trailers into the list where the games are separated into the free, paid and star categories. This app includes adventure games where you control a hero jumping, running, collecting on amusing platforms, some kinds of puzzle games which are based physics, and many of the cartoon games with the famous cartoon characters and their entertaining adventures. These games are generally 2D, but some of them have 3D platforms such as some racing games. Explore new hidden worlds, enter mysterious places and escape from monsters, dragons, and ghosts. Cartoon lovers will find famous cartoon characters as well. The list includes various running and adventure games for kids and adults. Features: - Share to your facebook friends. - Free and paid categories - Games' videos - A complete list of the platforming games - Daily update - Star category including the best platforming games chosen by the editor - Most popular and new released platforming games - Pretty nice screenshots What's new? - Game reviews are added so you can gain insight into the games. - You can write your comments about the app and games in speech bubbles. - Game trailers and walkthroughs are added to indicate how to play. Functionalities: - All kinds of 2D platform games in one app - Ease of access to the latest and most popular games - Friendly user interface design - Various subcategory games - Similar games recommended - File size under 1 MB - Fast installing - Compatible with nearly all android versions of phones and tablets About the games on our list: These features are not for the each game on our list but for some of them. - Puzzle platformer games where you solve puzzles, find hidden objects, use physics devices to continue - 3D side- scroller running games - Physics-based platforms including challenging puzzle levels - Some kinds of action and adventure games with original and adorable characters, courageous heroes, famous cartoon characters and endless journeys - Some kinds of racing games with 3D platforms - 2D platforms that can be categorized as arcade games where you lead a character to collect coins - Running platforms including actions like rope climbing, double jumping, wall sliding, rolling - Physics-based, puzzle platforms with a hero in adventurous and mysterious quest - Power-ups, coins, item, fruits to collect as running and jumping - Dragons, monsters, ghosts, mischievous plants, zombies to escape from - Mysterious places where monsters wait you - New and fantastic worlds - Lovely cartoon graphics for kids and toddlers - Magical realm of dungeons, towns, treasures and devious monsters to explore

description: Always dreamt of a world of games? Want to play the best games and transfer your points from one game to the other? Well, you've reached the right place! PlayScape offers a unified cross-gaming experience allowing you to discover the most fantastic games all in one place! Just try one game and you will be hooked. With these top-notch games, you can unlock the coolest levels and special items, earn points and advance to the highest levels! By doing so you will be rewarded with Experience Points and Virtual Currency, which is completely transferable to any game in the PlayScape catalog. PlayScape Coins are redeemable for virtual goods, new games and power ups, so it's definitely worth your while. What are you waiting for? It's as easy as 1,2,3… 1. Download PlayScape 2. Get access to 50 of the best games - for FREE! 3. Earn points and virtual currency transferrable to all games. 4. And most important – have fun!!! How do you get points and virtual currency? PlayScape has a Mission Wall that provides you with a range of constantly updated missions. These enable you to accumulate Experience Points and Virtual Currency – otherwise known as PlayScape Coins. You raise your PlayScape bankroll by completing various tasks, unlocking new games, levels and of course - winning. Highlights: - A wide range of FREE Android games – Arcade and Action, Brain & Puzzle, Casual games and more. - Games that constantly refreshed without the hassle of syncing. - Compatible with all Android phones PlayScape requires certain permissions. Here is a short explanation of what and why. Storage (modify/delete USB storage content) - Used for storing the app data (images and such) outside of the phone's internal storage Network communication (full internet access) - Used for syncing the catalog and missions Phone calls (read phone status and ID) - Used for our user account (based on the Android ID and phone's identity) System tools (Prevent the phone from sleeping) - Prevent the phone from sleeping – to make sure catalog sync can run with no interruption View network state - To make sure heavy downloads are made on WiFi System tools (automatically start at boot) - To start the syncing of the catalog/missions once a day Visit our website: http://www.playscape.com
release_text: Countless new games, reduced file size and bug fixes to make your experience as pleasurable as possible!

description: Spades is a fun trick-taking card game like Hearts, Euchre & Canasta, but this Multiplayer card game is played in 2 player teams which adds a total new element of strategy. Hardwood Spades Free breathes new life into your favorite spades card game with excellent graphics and soothing environments. If you're new to Spades, don't worry you can find how to play tutorials. If you are familiar with Bridge, spades is much less complicated and easy to play but is similar. Hardwood Spades has the strategy aspects of a Texas Hold’em Poker game but with partners which really adds some new and fun gameplay. And it has luck elements of Slot games all with quality artwork and pleasant background sounds and background that take on a mini vacation. ★★★★★ "Great game I'm a big spades player an this game is awesome!♥" -Phenomenal W Play online spades with players from across the internet or with family and friends. You can even post your winnings to Facebook for all your friends to see. Spades game variations included in Hardwood Spades Free offline and Multiplayer online live spades modes with multiple levels of difficulty: * Partnership Spades (traditional) * Partnership - Suicide * Partnership - Mirrors * Individual Spades * Individual -Mirror * Individual-Cutthroat * Individual -Cutthroat Mirror Online Spades Multiplayer social games are free. Also check out our other Hardwood online card and boardgames: Hardwood Euchre - Jacks are Trump in this trick taking game. Hardwood Hearts - A great trick taking game where the goal is to take the least amount of points. Hardwood Backgammon - Who can move their men to safety 1st? & Video Poker Duel - Play competitive video poker just like you'd find in a casino. If you also like some solitude, all of our games can be played as single player with multiple difficulty levels. But for the ultimate single player experience, check out our game Hardwood Solitaire IV available here on google play.

description: " The app for the fans, by the fans, of the fans who love Idol –Fandom! Haven’t you heard?! Ten million people are already using this app- Fandom! You can find out about Idol through Fandom, talk with fans from all over the world and also feel like Idol is greeting you personally through your lock screen! View Pictures There are many unique features such as stars’ photos and albums, which you can share with your friends or your special someone. The daily pictures are diverse and varied, and you can also save directly and share these pictures with your friends! View Schedule Don’t miss a minute of your favorite star’s schedule. Fans can edits stars’ schedules and create their own! You’ve never experienced anything like this before! Fans can directly upload information such as reruns, broadcasts, signing events and so on. So you’ll know virtually everything about your idol’s schedule! View Video Of course, you can watch your star’s music video, in addition to many variety and television shows! Album list You can listen to all of your favorite star’s music and albums! Interactive Lock Screen Complete the app with your name and picture! Every morning the app will call your name and ask you, “Did you sleep well?” In the evening, it says “I miss you” . With Fandom, you’ll have something to look forward to at any time of day. Alternate Lock Screen Instead of your favorite star’s photo, you can also insert photos or your boyfriend or girlfriend, pets or friends and use the lock screen So, how about starting Fandom today? ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Question and Feedback E-mail : help@bluemoon.io Tweeter : https://twitter.com/star_fandom Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/io.bluemoon.fandom Kakao Story Channel : https://story.kakao.com/ch/idolfandom Naver blog : http://blog.naver.com/idolfandom

description: Wake up with a random song each morning with the music alarm clock Megalarm! This is the full version. It removes the limitations of the Lite version: - Unlimited alarms - Unlimited music libraries - Each music library can have unlimited music components - Can wake up by Genre of music also!! Simply group your favorite Artists, Albums, Genres, Playlists and/or Songs into a Music Library. Then create an alarm and associate a Music Library to it. Now wake up to new music each day. No need to hear the same song (or ringtone... even worse) every morning. And if you don't like the song playing, just skip to the next one! Available in: - English - French - Spanish - Dutch - German - Italian I am very reactive with bug fixes and always eager to hear ways to improve it. Please rate the app if you like it (or don't), constructive criticism always helps. However, if despite my many nights and (more appropriately mornings) of testing it happens to crash or misbehave with you, please write me and give me a chance to fix the problem before leaving negative ratings. You'll find a crash report on the SD card in the Logs folder, please include that with your message, it will help me out greatly. It is worth mentioning that there are some really big improvements are coming for the 2.0 version. Stay tuned! The app needs some special permissions on the phone to work. I assure you no monkey business is going on. The permissions are explained below: * android.permission.VIBRATE: So the alarm can vibrate (if you want it to) when it rings. * android.permission.WAKE_LOCK: This is to wake up the phone from a sleep state when the alarm rings so that we can play music and activate the screen. * android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD: So that once the alarm starts ringing, we can bypass the lock screen and display the ringing screen immediately. * android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: To initialize the alarms (if any are active) once the phone is turned on (or rebooted). * android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE: So as not to ring the alarm if you're on the phone. It will wait till you've finished your call to go off. * android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: * android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Needed as of KitKat (Android 4.4) to play music from the sdcard Enjoy!!
release_text: v1.7.4 - songs are now unlikely to be repeated in the last 4 songs played - fix a rare crash when editing a music library and the music hasn't finished loading - fix crash when dismissing an alarm on a fresh install of Megalarm

description: With "Speed Racing Ultimate 2", discover: • New Design! • New SuperCars! • 20 New Tracks! • High Graphic's Quality! • Better speed and steering sensations! • XP Manager! Pilot 8 Prestigious SuperCars on New 20 Tracks around the world! Enhance your experience on each track and increase your global XP! The "Shop" is always available on the main menu to buy more powerful SuperCars! Fasten your seatbelt and take the control of your eXtremely Powerful SuperCar! You have mastered acceleration, braking and steering! The Drift is your friend! Don't forget that: "The speed will be your ally, only if you master!" The tracks are more and more technical and require an optimal concentration! If your are new, I suggest you to start with the initiation track to learn to control your SuperCar. It's available on the main menu by clicking on the "Help" button. Follow the instructions and you will be ready to have fantastic sensations! After that, try to get the Gold Cup of the ULTIMATE track! You can select the level of difficulty: Beginner, Expert or Pilot. If you choose "Pilot", all races will be more difficult but you will win more money! If your are in the top 3, you will win a special Bonus! You also can choose the "Fight" Level and Try to be the Best! In this level, there is no Limit. Only one rule: IT MUST REMAIN ONE! The time of each race is recorded. Share your score online and try to stay in the world ranking! So you can compete with players around the World! You can see the rankings at any time by clicking on the logo "World High Scores". Incredible speed and steering sensations await you! Are you ready to challenge the best drivers of this Incredible Real Racing Game? It's up to you! ••• Game Features ••• • Drive 8 different Prestigious Supercars! • Total Control of your SuperCar • Full 3D Real Time rendering • 20 different tracks • Incredible arcade physics • High Graphic's Quality! • Save as much money and Power go up • Customize your SuperCar • Training mode • Realistic sound environment • Music by "REVENGE" • Nitro Bonus • XP Manager • Select the difficulty level • Select the accelerometer sensibility • Select the Camera: Inside or Outside • Upload your Score and enter in the World Ranking
